We look forward to welcoming you back to us and thank you for being a valued Hilton guest.

Summary: The room was unacceptable. The window was open with no screen door. The stunk like feces. When we asked for another room, they said they were all booked. We were left with no place to stay at almost midnight. Please do not attempt to stay here! I wouldn’t wish this on anyone
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay with us.  As I have responded previously to your review on another site, the room was out of order for bathroom fan issue which was caused by a bad fan motor located in the attic of the property which enclosed the room with a burnt motor smell.  It is true we accidentally released that room into the inventory and assigned it to you.  I make no excuses for this and the experience is understandably disappointing.  In my response to you, I have asked for communication with you to make this right. I cannot bring back the experience you could have had with us but I can try to make sure your future experience with the Hilton Garden Inn brand to remain positive.  Another aspect of service is how we handle situations when issues arise and our guest is visibly upset.   Once again, I apologize for this experience and accept responsibility for this experience.  This is not the experience I want my guests to ever have.

Summary: Unfriendly and stingy management. The hotel needs to be upgraded; the laundry facilities were outdated, though they still charged over $3 for a cycle. The manager charged more than a staff member for a detergent. The breakfast had a poor selection of food. No complementary coffee throughout the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing a feedback regarding your stay experience with us.  I am sorry you felt that the management was stingy and unfriendly.  While our facilities are a bit dated, the service standard we provide exceeds the expectations of our guests as evident by our many Outstanding reviews.  The Garden Grille and Bar serves an all-you-can-eat made-to-order breakfast complemented by fresh sliced fruit, pastries, dairy products and juices.  While understand the importance of complimentary coffee throughout the day, being a Hilton Garden Inn we have standards we follow.  May I suggest staying at our sister property, the Hampton Inn located adjacent to us since they not only provide free coffee throughout the day, but serve up complimentary breakfast as well.  We hope you will give the Hampton a try next time you are back in the area.

Summary: Very friendly staff who go out of their way to be sure your needs are met.  Great location if you are doing business in the area,  Rooms were updated and very clean.  Nice to have comp breakfast with server service.  Would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East\Lake Forest. I am happy to see that the location, service provided, and amenities exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back home to us should your travels bring you back to South Orange County!

Summary: Cozy hotel with modern amenities.  Great staff made us feel welcomed.  The location was a perfect location.  Close to shopping centers. Room was nice, clean and well maintained.  Landscape was well maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East\Lake Forest.  I am happy to see that the location, service provided, and amenities exceeded your expectations.  We look forward to welcoming you back home to us should your travels bring you back to South Orange County!

Summary: Overall good experience.  Clean, spacious room with nice amenities. (Fridge, microwave and coffee maker, comfortable bed and pull out sofa). Breakfast not included,  $15 for buffet breakfast. Will stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your feedback.  I am happy to see that the amenities we offer have given you a good experience.  With our clean and spacious room along with friendly team members, our onsite restaurant, Garden Grille and Bar serves up daily Breakfast Buffet with fresh, made to order items.  We also serve dinner daily along with room service from 5pm to 10pm.    There are many packages offered which includes breakfast without paying for the full price.  As a Hilton Honors member, you have the option of Complimentary breakfast for you and a guest when you have reached Gold or Diamond status!  We look forward to serving you again when you return in the future!

Summary: The place allowed me to check in early and the staff was very friendly and so professional. I loved the cleanliness of the facility and their rooms. It was well maintained and they took pride in managing the facility. It highly recommend and I would definitely come back and book my stay with them!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and providing your feedback! I'm happy to see that the amenities and services offered by my team exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Property was nice and the staff was very friendly.  Great options in the area for food and entertainment.  Will stay again at this location when I'm in the area.  I also advised my co-workers of my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and providing your feedback! I'm delighted to see that the amenities and services offered by my team exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Front desk staff had a bad attitude towards me and my family (2 kids and husband). We asked for two extra pillows because ours was either stinky or dirty—received the two pillows that had a foul odor.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest. Please accept my apologies for the less than satisfactory experience with the condition of the pillows and service. We will continually work hard to ensure the experience of our guests are exceeding their expectations. We hope we are given another opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary: I always stay at Hilton hotels, chose this one because it was close to friends in the area and close to Laguna Beach and Spectrum  Super friendly staff, always clean and quiet. Daughter and friends had a separate room, cost was worth the extra room!
Manager Response: Happy Belated Birthday!  Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback! I'm delighted to see that the amenities, location, and services offered by my team exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: My son moved nearby so this will often be my temporary home. Location is great, parking is ample, staff is friendly and helpful and rooms are large. I wish they had safety deposit boxes in the rooms. There is a shopping center nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to being your temporary home as you visit your son.  I am happy to see that the service provided by my team along with location and amenities offered has met your needs.  We look forward to welcoming you home!

Summary: In an area with plenty of restaurants and shopping, this is a fine hotel to use as a base for a week or two. Rooms are comfortable, quiet, and clean, and service is friendly and efficient. I enjoyed my stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and providing your feedback!  I'm delighted to see that the amenities and services offered by my team exceeded your expectations.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: The hotel staff was friendly and polite. The hotel and rooms could use some updates. It definitely shows signs of wear, although it was clean in the room.  There is a refrigerator and coffee maker in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  Please accept my apologies for the less than satisfactory experience with your room and overall condition of the hotel.  We will continually work hard to ensure the experience of our guests are exceeding their expectations.  We hope we are given another opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary: Great staff made the stay excellent. We arrived very late; so our true first staff welcome was from Sandi and Fadi the next morning. Those two are so welcoming, they really made it just such a delight.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am delighted to see that Fadi and Sandi made an excellent impression on you.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel 2 years ago and enjoyed it so much we returned this trip. Unfortunately, we found some areas to be diminished and disappointing.On the plus side, the large room and public areas were clean and pleasant. It was warm and we used the pool area, but found it to be poorly maintained - leaves and debris, wet towels, and paper cups left around the deck each day. We receive breakfast free of charge with our membership level and were glad we did not pay $15 each as it was poorly done. Vacated tables remained dirty, many of the self serve items were not replenished an hour before closing. Above all, the cooked to order items were just badly cooked, either over or under done and unappetizing. We are not fussy eaters but could not finish anything we were served. This

Please accept my apologies for the less than satisfactory experience with the cleanliness of the hotel and service at the Garden Grille and Bar.  We will continually work hard to ensure the experience of our guests are exceeding their expectations.  We hope we are given another opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: Charming family hotel thats clean, nice and convenient!
Summary: I've stayed here twice in the last 3 months! Both were very satisfyimg experiences! The front desk staff were friendly and helpful, treated me like family! Housekeeping also were great if they saw me wrestling with my key card and too much baggage they appeared out of nowhere to lend a helping hand, and more than once! The room comfortable, spacious and clean! The bathroom was appropriately sized and fully appointed. The shower was great! I look forward to future visits to this hotel!
Manager Response: Welcome back!  Thank you for staying with us again and I'm happy to see that the experience you've had during your multiple stays has been consistently good.  We look forward to welcoming you back home to us for many more visits to come!

Summary: A great Hilton Propety in a great location! The rooms were so nice and cozy I wanted to stay in my suite the whole weekend! Especially with the super clean refrigerators and microwaves in each room. But, business calls...!  I will be definitely be staying there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback regarding your recent stay with us!  We would have loved having you stay with us much, much longer!  I am happy to see that our hotel's amenities and services provided exceeded your expectations.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again!

Summary: This hotel was a good fit for my family. We were traveling for a baseball tournament at Orange County Great Park. It was located near both the park and the Irvine Spectrum. Accessing the Wi-Fi was easy. The staff was incredibly kind and helpful. And, the custom breakfast included was a plus!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review regarding your stay experience with us and hope the baseball tournament was fun.  We host many sports teams who travel to the Orange County Great Park to compete and are in an ideal location.  We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary Heading: So Happy I Chose To Stay Here
Summary: This hotel is nothing but excellent I will definitely stay there every trip that I have to make to California. From the front desk to the housekeeping they know exactly how to treat their guest as a V.I.P.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback regarding your stay experience with us!  Your comments have been shared with the staff.  We look forward to welcoming you home on your future trips to California!

Summary: Its a good hotel in a good location. Bed's are not comfortable at all but the room size is nice. Check in and Check out was pretty simple, cost was a little higher than in my personal opinion it is worth.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review regarding your recent stay with us at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am sorry to hear that the beds weren't comfortable.  Was there anything else we could have done better to earn a perfect rating?  Your opinion matters to us and look forward to having you back with us!

Summary: Worst location I’ve visited. Really rude staff. Management is rude. Not helpful. You get nothing for your money - except 4 walls. Lots of noise room to room. Disturbing. Billing practices shady. The $15 breakfast is a joke. Rooms aren’t very clean. This location needs overhauled. Carpets dirty. Total disappointment.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts and concerns about your recent stay with us. Our goal is to ensure that each guest has an excellent experience and it seems that we fell short. Please be assured that this is not the kind of service we strive to provide. Please contact me personally at +1-949-859-4000 at so we can further discuss your stay at your earliest convenience.

Summary: This Hilton Garden Inn was a fantastic stay for the past ten days.  We have stayed here on prior occasions and will always stay here on future visits.    Most noteworthy is the staff!  A special thanks to Sandi at the front desk for her warmth, hospitality, kindness and overall positive and happy demeanor.    Another thanks to two of our daily morning breakfast servers. Fadi and Cruz did an awesome job taking our orders and doing so with a smile and welcoming attitude!  We will miss you but keep doing the great job that you do every day!!  Of course our room was perfect and the overall property was our home for the past ten days.    Thank you to the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East / Lake Forest!!!  Mike and Leah - room 335
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us during your long stay with us Mike and Leah!  Our team members work hard everyday to ensure every guest has a great experience and your survey reflects that.  I will personally thank Sandi, Amado, and Fadi for the hospitality they have shown to you.  We look forward to welcoming you back with us and Happy New Year!

Summary: We were attending a conference at Saddleback Church and this hotel was just 5 minutes away. The staff were very friendly and helpful. We also used the Board Room for 2 meetings and the meeting room was equipped with coffee, teas, hot water, bottled water, note pads & pens. The hotel made special arrangements for lunch to be prepared for us for one of our meetings and the menu choices were all delicious! I used the business center quite a bit to do printing and collating and Sandi and Beverly at the front desk cheerfully loaned me scissors and stapler. There is a mini-pantry next to the front desk where you can buy food to heat in your room microwave as well as ice cream, candy bars and toiletries. In the evenings, free cookies are available at the front desk. The rooms are
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback regarding your experience with us on your most recent trip.  I am happy to see that the services and amenities provided exceeded your expectations.  Your comments have been shared with our team with special thanks to Sandi and Beverly.  We hope to see you again next year.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: Have stayed here numerous times and the property usually does not disappoint. Good location for what we need it for and service is usually spot on. We did have a minor hiccup our first morning, but Fadi came to the rescue the next morning. Not sure why they do not offer water or coffee in the evening anymore///
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay experience with us and welcome back!  With team members like Fadi, we make sure our guests are taken cared of.  I am looking into the reason why we do not offer complimentary water and coffee in the evening and hope to get this resolved soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back to us in the future.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: My daughter's friends live in Orange County, in Lake Forest, and I have for the past year been driving down every other weekend.  It has been exhausting this drive from Hollywood.  This August I started booking a hotel first with the Hotel Irvine, which is very glamorous and city like, just like in Hollywood, very busy and bustling, and rather expensive, because I am doing this drive for my daughter, what I need is relaxation, and quiet, and an affordable price so that I can afford to do this 2 x a month so my daughter can see her friends.  The staff are friendly and always make us feel welcome.  It is like our second home.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback regarding your experiences with us at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest!  I am happy to see that we have become your second home during your biweekly trips to the area.  We look forward to continuing providing the service travelers have come to expect from Hilton and its family of hotels.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: I stayed here one night; the rooms were fine but I was disappointed in how they valued me as a frequent Hilton traveler.  First, I was given a ground floor room; this has never happened to me as a Gold or Diamond.  I asked for a different room and was denied.   I accepted the room which was right next to the driveway and very noisy.  It was not a good night's sleep. Next time I'll choose a different Hilton property in the same area and hope they value the Hilton Honors program.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  As a Hilton Honors member, your loyalty is appreciated.  I am very sorry to hear about your less than satisfactory experience.  Rest assured, I will be personally training my team members to show appreciation for our most valued Honors members.  I hope you will be giving us another opportunity to serve you should your travels bring you back to the area!

Summary: Used this property for one night stay. Very easy on off the highway. Hotel was very clean and comfortable. Rooms were the standard garden type. Breakfast was great. Service was also outstanding. Id stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.  I am delighted to hear that you had a more than satisfactory experience with us.  Our team members work hard to ensure every guest has a positive experience.  I look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Needed a hotel in the Lake Forest, CA and choose the Hilton Garden Inn. Great choice. Friendly staff at front desk as well as at breakfast. Great cook to order breakfast! Convenient place, right off Tollway and not that far off of the Five.
Manager Response: Dear DZook,  Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear your were able to enjoy our made-to-order breakfast. We hope to see you again soon. Safe travels!

Summary: This was my third time staying at this hotel.  It was very conveniently located for my needs on this trip.  The hotel is well maintained, and the grounds are clean.  The mountain views are nice.  Staff is very polite and helpful.  The rooms are tidy.  There is a large city park close by.  It is a nice place to relax after work.  It has walking trails, Basketball hoops, Baseball, Soccer fields etc.  I will stay at this hotel again, if in this area.
Manager Response: Dear Waseem K,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear you were able to take advantage of our location. Can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary: Hilton Garden Inn is one of the hotel chains I use during my business trips. This is one of the hotels preferred by my company. The rooms are generally clean and spacious. The amenities are great and the price is reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great Review! We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you back again soon.

Summary: Clean and comfortable rooms. Good but limited breakfast option with a few food and beverage items for sale near the helpdesk during off-hours. The location is perfect if traveling to and from John Wayne aiport as it is less than 30 mins away from SNA.
Manager Response: Dear corapangan,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear our location was perfect for you. Next time you visit I hope you decide to eat or enjoy a cocktail at our restaurant in the evening time. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great location. Close to everything. Very convenient. The hotel is quiet. Great service with nice comfortable room. Pool was not crowded or noisy. I would recommend to anyone to stay here. Price was great and we were able to get a late checkout that we needed.
Manager Response: Dear George E.   Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear you were able to enjoy our outdoor pool. We hope to see you again soon. Safe Travels!

Summary: This hotel was very accommodating.  We had around 50 people as part of our group traveling for a youth hockey tournament.  They allowed us to hang out in the lobby every night and were super accommodating with any and all of our requests and needs.  Kyle at the front desk was AWESOME!  The Bartender (sorry forget her name) was also super awesome!!!
Manager Response: Dear AZHockeyMom,  Thank you so much for your kind words towards our staff. I will be sure to share these comments with Kyle and Patricia. Thank you again for staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!!

Summary: Quiet, clean rooms.  Excellent quality for the price.  Would stay again if the need arises.  Bummer that breakfast is not included as at other locations.  $15 for breakfast seems a bit much.  Didn't order food.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our rooms. Our room attendants work very hard to ensure cleanliness and comfort for all guests. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Good property for a business trip!
Summary: The hotel is in a good location. A little away from the highway and crowds but close enough if you want. Great selection of restuarants and shopping. Nice view of the mountains. There is also a local park you can access.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great Review! We are happy that you enjoyed our location. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you back again soon.

Summary: I checked in and the cleanliness and family friendly staff was a pleasant after driving 8 hours or so. Breakfast was excellent service. Staff was very quick to give great service. Room was nice, bed was comfy, small frig, microwave and coffee machine was appreciated!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear you were able to enjoy our Breakfast Buffet. Be sure to eat at our restaurant in the evening next time you stay. Safe travels!

Summary: I stayed at this property last month during a work trip. We paid 1000+ for 3 nights stay which was a bit excessive considering that property is nothing to write home about. They have a very tiny pool which is good for families with young children. Since it was so small and already crowded with families, we didnt bother trying it out. There is a fitness centre onsite which didnt seem very encouraging as it is very tiny. Place is far away from a proper mall too and so choice for dinner was limited to either Irvine Spectrum mall or at hotel. Hotel offers buffet breakfast and at 20/- per person, I would say their spread was a bit underwhelming. There staff is another story. They were all very attentive and helpful so five stars for that.  There rooms were comfortable but very noisy
Manager Response: Dear rsatnam,  First and foremost, I would thank you for your review and kind words towards our property. Your stay with us was during our peak season which caused higher rates. We do offer competitive rates throughout the year and our discounted Hilton Honors Member rate is available year round. In addition to a few local favorite shops, the Irvine Spectrum and South Coast Plaza are two highly recommended shopping areas our guests frequent. We take pride in the service our staff gives our guests so we greatly appreciate those comments. We hope to see you again soon. Safe travels!!

Summary: Loved almost everything about this first-class hotel.  It is run very well, is in a nice quiet area, and is extremely guest-friendly.  Loved the small but convenient and well-stocked grill-and-bar.  Front-desk lady was very helpful and friendly.  For some reason the hotel had not been able to get the ice machine fixed, so had to go to another floor to get ice.  Room rate was higher than usual because of a group gathering; rate at a slightly different time would have been really reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear Gary W.  We thank you for your kind words towards our staff, I will be sure to share them with the team. I am glad to hear you were able to enjoy our Garden Grill restaurant. I'm very sorry about the issues with our ice machine, that issue has now been resolved. We hope to see you again soon. Safe travels!

Summary: The hotel is a little far from the shopping places we go to in Irvine. But, good location and the room is well kept and clean. The swimming pool is small but enough for my children to swim laps and play. Plenty of parking spaces and well lit.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good facilities and great, fantastic staff!!
Summary: Significant space in the king size handicap room on the 2nd floor.  Facility is heavily used, repainted and updated and is starting to show age. The comforters MUST go! I requested that mine got changed out but a different one was not much better. The pool was busy and looked to be used often. Great location right off the highway and uses the same parking lot as the Hampton.  Staff was very kind and helpful. I will stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Check-in was quick and the room was clean and comfortable.  Friendly front desk staff.  Breakfast the first day was disappointing.  The service was really slow and not attentive.  Also, the food was cold.  The next day, however, our server was Fadi and he was great.  He was quick, friendly and helpful!  Overall, a good hotel for what we needed.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Consider going to the Hampton next door
Summary: Stayed overnight on points. The location was good. As a Diamond member though I expected better.   Checked in at 9:15 PM. Went straight to the hot tub before it closed. It was a nice pool area, but the hot tub was like bath water.   We headed upstairs to our room and called room service at 9:40 pm. The room service menu in the room stated room service was available until 10pm, but they said they closed the kitchen at 9:30. We had to go out to eat. The plus side is there are a ton of restaurants nearby.   The room was clean but bed made horrible sounds with every movement. BTW I am 125 pounds. The bathroom tub looked worn with silicone holding it together.   Breakfast the next day was in the smallest HGI dining area I had seen. Your choices are tables that are a few inches from
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel with clean rooms and bathroom.  House keeping is very responsive to requests.  Hotel is located near Walmart and other chain stores. Gas station also nearby.  Only down side is breakfast is not included and must be purchased, however McDonalds is near by just google it.
Manager Response: Dear Ahsan S,  Thank you for your great 5-star review and thanks for the compliments to our staff. We're so happy you had a great stay. As you mentioned, we are near many dining and shopping options. Some within walking distance.  It was our pleasure serving you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Expected more.... bedding what was dirty at arrival. Tub did not drain properly. And complimentary internet wouldn’t work on iPhone .. I suggest to offer more than $15 breakfast buffet. Will not stay again
Manager Response: Hello Michelle E,  Thank you for taking the time to review and I am so sorry that your visit was well below our usual higher standards. This is not how we operate and I am disappointed that we were unable to give you that excellent experience that you should expect from us. Know that your review is important to us and rest assured that we we are going over this with our staff.   Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Nice hotel even though it’s an older property.  Close to resurants and the freeway. Quiet rooms and good service.  Great coffee in the lobby. The staff was helpful and very friendly. I would stay here again if I am in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Phil B.  Thank you for your kind words towards our hotel and staff. We are glad you were able to enjoy the free coffee we have out in our lobby. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Safe travels!!

Summary: Great stay! Breakfast was good.. we used the WiFi, gym and pool. Our room was clean and staff was helpful. This hotel is located right by a lot of restaurants and stores. I would stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: Hello Mayax6,  So nice to have had you stay here and thank you for the 5-star review! Our hotel does have many useful amenities and yes, we are located near many dining, shopping and highway options.   Hope to serve you again.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Couldn't Ask for a Better Location!!!
Summary: I had been less-than-satisfied at the last hotel I had stayed at when in Lake Forest, so I thought I would give the Hilton a try, and I am certainly glad I did!  The hotel is very conveniently located right down the road from shopping, a movie theater, and just about any kind of food you might want to eat!!  Because the hotel is located on the "industrial side" of Towne Center, it is very quiet with not a lot of through traffic.   While the toll road drops you off right down the road, you can get around paying the toll by simply taking Lake Forest Drive.   The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating, allowing me both an early check-in and late check-out, which I was extremely grateful for!   I especially enjoyed conversations with both Derek and Sean!  The facilities and
Manager Response: Hello AlansNana,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write this wonderful review. Yes we are centrally located between Los Angeles and San Diego yet close to everything. We are in a quieter part of town but have access to multiple highways to just about everywhere. There are so many dining and shopping options nearby that nothing is far at all. Thank you for complimenting our staff. I too have great conversations with Derek and Sean - they are neat fellas.  We so look forward to your next visit and we're happy we made your stay worth your time.   Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: all amenities for the business traveler.  friendly and helpful staff.  very comfortable bed.  rooms are slightly dated but for 1 or 2 night stay for business, the room was more than adequate.  free coffee, good television, free internet, and effective air conditioning all equal a good value.
Manager Response: Hello theberardis,  Thank you so much for visiting our hotel and all of your great compliments. We work hard to ensure that you have a great stay and that we are meeting your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to review and hope to serve you again very soon.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This our third time staying at this property in the past few years. Our last stay was absolutely horrible. Our room had dirty sheets left from the previous guests, the bathroom was filthy. Sink was dirty, shower curtin had stains in it, the shower backed up while using it. The room had a bad odoor. While we were unpacking we heard a knock on the door and the door opened before we can answer. I was the hotel manager asking us if the TV was working. What !!!!! Who just knocks on a guests door and walks in without permission. Absolutely inconsiderate. Will never stay at this property.
Manager Response: Jason G,  Thank you for taking the time to write. I'm so sorry that your visit to our hotel fell below our usual standards. I also apologize for entering your room to check the status of the t.v., not knowing you had literally, just checked in. We would never enter your Guest room knowing you might be inside, without your permission.   If you decide to give us another opportunity to serve you, I encourage you to contact me directly. I will make sure your room is perfect before your arrival.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Friendly helpful staff, clean lobby, pool area and rooms.  Delicious hot breakfast. The pool is small but it is heated. There is also a hot tub. The AC is somewhat loud but not a big deal. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Hello elizabethrcerda,  It was our pleasure serving you. Thank you for complimenting our staff and property. I also enjoy the breakfast myself. While we do have daily breakfast specials, feel free to order a custom meal.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable, no frills, but excellent business trip location
Summary: I travel quite a bit for business, and have stayed in very fancy hotels, and some that were decidedly not as fancy. This hotel hit all the right marks, at a ridiculously good price point. The room was wonderfully comfortable, great shower pressure and excellent staff. The breakfast area perhaps a bit cramped in the morning, but that just encouraged striking up a conversation with other business travelers, which was lovely and enjoyable. Lovely, friendly service every morning from Fadi for breakfast! Excellent, responsive front desk staff as well. Will plan to stay here again next time I’m in the area.
Manager Response: Hello Barb M,  I am so happy that you had an excellent stay and thank you for taking the time to write this review. I appreciate you pointing out our friendly staff, specifically Fadi - he's truly a gem. You'll find that most of our hotel Guests are also friendly, and as you encountered easy to strike up a conversation with.  We look forward to serving you again.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Checked in: Friday, March 2-3 2018 We were visiting my brother in UCI. It was about 20 mins. drive without traffic. Rooms could use some upgrade. But overall, okay experience. Would stay here again because of the location.
Manager Response: Hello jjstarsjj,  Very nice having you here and thank you for taking the time to review. Our location is central to many highways, dining and shopping options. I'm so happy it worked out for you.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Hiiii  This hotel has a exceptional staff. I was so worried and sad, I spoke to Steviana (Stevy) and she made me laugh! I felt so good. I felt that everything was going to be okay. Then, I spoke to Mike the manager. He was so kind and help me to solve my problem.   Thank you so much!   GOD is amazing! All problems were solved   Thankfully,  Priscila E. Talavera-Díaz
Manager Response: Hello Priscila T,  Yes it was our sincere pleasure helping you with your reservation. I agree with you that our Front Desk agent Steviana, makes me laugh too! Thank for allowing us to assist you and for taking the time to write this review.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The staff here are extremely helpful and make you feel like you're at home instead of a hotel. They always greet you as you come in and out. They helped answering hard questions we had about moving to the area.
Manager Response: Dear Z2226NPelisaa,  It was our pleasure making your stay comfortable and helping to familiarize you with the area. Thank you for taking the time to review and we hope to see you again. Feel free to stop in and ask more questions - we would love to help!  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: One thing about traveling with the boss: He always stays at a Hilton. Our recent trip to Southern California was no exception.  He chose this hotel. Fine with me! He's paying the bill!  Although I know that SoCal has lots of hotels, I was a bit perplexed to discover that there were a number of Hilton Garden Inns in the area. This property is either in Irvine East or Lake Forest, depending on to whom you are talking.  A bit tricky for the Uber driver who asked: Is that in Irvine or Lake Forest? Dude, I don't know.  I am from Colorado. After the initial Uber driver turned me down (huh?) the second driver was more helpful, and whisked me off.  Two things I always remember about a hotel:  How attractive is its lobby and how friendly is the staff.  The lobby causes the first
Manager Response: Hello RVJnCO,  Thank you so much for such a very detailed and honest review. You have hit all the points we attempt to demonstrate for every Guest. I will be sure to share with our staff the level of detail you have described here, as they all work very hard to please. Thank you for mentioning.  Our address is Foothill Ranch, but it's easier to tell your Uber driver Lake Forest. It was incorporated into Lake Forest in 2000. We are close to many shopping, dining and highway options, and, of course many different corporate offices. We look forward to serving you and your boss again.   Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Well situated: close-by restaurants, shopping malls, highway.  Quiet environment.  Hotel is very clean, personnel makes you feel like home and are always available to help or answer any questions you might have.  Room size are excellent : enough room for working and relax as well.  Bed are very comfortable.
Manager Response: Hello GGalarneau,  I'm so happy you had an excellent visit at our hotel and thank you for taking the time to review. We do work hard to please our Guests and I'm so delighted you felt at home. Yes, we are close to many dining and shopping options, as well as multiple highways. Hope to see you again.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Staff & Management are what make this such a nice place to stay. Also every restaurant you could want is within 2 miles. Very convenient to the toll road and a really nice mall a few miles down the toll road
Manager Response: Hello JDC2769804,  I'm so happy you enjoyed your visit and that our staff took such good care of you. Yes we are closer to many shopping and dining options and multiple highways, yet tucked away along the foothills.  Looking forward to serving you again.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I recently stayed at this location for a work event and I give them a 10+!! The hotel was extremely clean, the staff was top notch, and breakfast was as always fresh and made to order. When I checked in there was an error with my reservation that was made on my end. The front desk staff and members of management jumped through hoops to make sure I was accommodated with my group. The alternative would have resulted in me getting split up from my colleagues and staying at a different hotel. I felt like they honestly cared about me, and appreciated my business. I look forward to returning to this location.
Manager Response: Hello Christine O,  Thank you so much for this great review. I do appreciate how you have commended our staff in serving you. It is very important to us that we make every effort to serve you and I'm glad we did!  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn lake forest ca
Summary: A wonderful facility located in the southern part of Orange County with easy access to freeways and various other amenities.  Everything was great the staff was wonderful restaurant was more than adequate for the type of facility and the location was perfect
Manager Response: Hello frankcQ6223QG,  It was our pleasure serving you and I'm so happy your stay was perfect! Yes, our location is very convenient to multiple highways, dining, shopping and about midway between San Diego and Los Angeles. Looking forward to serving you again.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The hotel that is staffed for the travler... if your looking for Great value, this hotel really delivers, Great Rooms, Great Restaurant, and a Great Staff. You can Stay here with confidence. The location is ideal for traveling in this area.
Manager Response: Dear John R,   Thank you for taking the time to review the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East / Lake Forest! We appreciate your five star rating and positive comments about our rooms, restaurant, staff, and prime location. We look forward to having you stay with us again!   Best,  Hotel Management

Summary: The front desk service was excellent.  The place was clean. It was easy to navigate around the city.  It is located near a mall and plenty of restaurants around and also only about 15 minutes away from La Guna Beach, CA.  The hotel looks new.
Manager Response: Dear Lialim,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property! We are delighted that you found the front desk service to be excellent and the location to be very convenient. We looking forward to having you stay with us again!  Best,  Hotel Management

Summary: Very clean and the staff was just great. Hi to Beverly. The lobby was so cozy and homey. Nice location near target old navy michaels and a  chinese buffet. A few minutes away from Irvine spectrum mall. It is also near Saddleback Church of Rick Warren, the author of The Purpose Driven Life.
Manager Response: Dear Ding G,  Thank you for giving the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest five stars! We appreciate your positive comments about our clean rooms, cozy lobby, great staff, and prime location. We look forward to having you stay with us again! We will let Beverly know that you said "hi."   Best,  Hotel Management

Summary: This hotel has a great location, near a lot of things that single or family would appreciate.  There are full breakfast options, complimentary internet, and staff was very nice.  I would definitely recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear Mccarthyd75,  Thank you for the five star rating of the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest! We appreciate your high compliments about our great location, friendly staff, complimentary internet, and our bountiful breakfast options. We looking forward to having you stay with us again!  Best,  Hotel Management

Summary: Everyone was really friendly and the breakfast was delicious. The parking was a bit odd but not really an issue. Complimentary internet was slow, but came with the stay anyways. Room was basic but nice and clean.
Manager Response: Dear Y9895EGmanuelr,   Thank you for taking the time to review the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest! We appreciate your five star rating. We are so happy that you found our staff to be very friendly and our breakfast to be delicious. We hope you stay with us again next time you are in the area!  Best,   Hotel Management

Summary: Very nice and clean. Perfect for business stay. Close to shopping and restaurants. Staff  were great. Convenient restaurant prices high though. Rooms have microwave and frig. Love the KCup in the room.
Manager Response: Dear jeanrO2798MD,  Thank you for giving the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest a five star rating! We are delighted that you enjoyed your business stay. Thank you for your positive compliments about our prime location and great stay.   Best,  Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed here because of location as we were there for a party and to visit friends and family. Check-in was quick and friendly, except one door card did not work and they made a new one when I went back. The front desk staff was great and very friendly. Since we had plans to visit people, we never ate anything at the hotel so have nothing on that. Even though I met Kevin and he told me what all he cooked for breakfast, we just never had time. I did spend some time at night at the bar, and have to say that Mandy was AWESOME! She works a few nights a week and is very friendly and makes you feel very welcome and comfortable. Stop by and say Hello to her. Our only problem was one evening we got back to the room after being gone all day to get ready to go out, and the room was not
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay here was excellent. The location is very close to our family and quite convenient. The staff was friendly and professional. The food was great and the service was excellent. I look forward to visiting this facility again. Thank you for such a nice stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not too close to anything kinda isolated. The rooms are aways clean the staff friendly and helpful. Also the place looks kinda new  . They share a parking lot with the Hampton Inn and both are owned by Hilton.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very clean hotel, super comfortable beds, great rooms, delicious breakfast and fresh made cookies in the lobby.  This was a great location if you are visiting the Orange county beaches!  Highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wonderful facility!  Excellent staff!  Would definitely recommend.  Staff was extremely accommodating and worked to satisfy our every need.   Welcoming, clean  rooms.  Could not have had a better experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Marlena in Sales and Hart in F&B were extremely helpful in making  sure our meetings were successful.  Meeting rooms, guest rooms, food were all terrific. We would defiantly consider having other meetings at this property.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Three couples reserved rooms for a event
Summary: The room was ready at 12 noon we were able to check in and go have a nice Lunch. And return for a short nap before our Dinner that evening . We met our friends a dinner and had a nice time with them,  Wine and Dine right there at the Hotel .. very nice and good food..  We were close to where our event was held so we could use Huber and that was great. I have stayed before and recommended it to our friends . Very clean and updated rooms.
Manager Response: Hello Mntnona2,  We're so happy we were able to get you your room early so you could get a good start on the afternoon. We do have a spacious lobby with a restaurant and bar for your convenience - so glad you could take advantage of it. Our location is central to multiple highways, dining and shopping; yet, tucked away from the city noise for your relaxation.  We look forward to serving you again.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Our hotel stay was so nice. We had two adults and two babies and the staff was personable and helpful. They got us a fan so we could have white noise in our room to help the babies sleep better. The hotel feels pretty new and the beds are really comfortable. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello 232stephs,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review. It's the little things that give us pleasure in serving our Guests. Fortunately we have abundant shopping nearby in the event you need last minute items for your babies, such as diapers or formula.  We look forward to serving you again.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The room was  average and the bed was comfortable. What I don't understand is why is costs $14.95 for breakfast? We always stay at a Hilton property and really enjoy the free continental breakfast. It was kind of disappointing!
Manager Response: Hello Biglers,  Thank you for taking the time to review and I'm happy your bed was comfortable! You are correct, some Hilton properties do offer a complimentary, basic buffet. Our buffet is expanded with a hot made-to-order menu too. On your next visit, we can look at a room rate that includes breakfast. I would be happy to assist with that.   Hope to see you again.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I slept well here. And I was able to get a hot shower.  And they cleaned the room before and during (and I assume after) my stay. I would stay here again. I would recommend this location of Hilton Garden Inn's as a worthy place to stay on your next trip too.
Manager Response: Dear 373trevorh,  I am so happy that you slept well - that is so important when travelling. We appreciate the compliments and look forward to serving you again soon. Keep in mind, our location is great because we are centered between Los Angeles and San Diego; in addition, there are many dining and shopping options nearby.   Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: BEST hotel in Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest Area for business travel
Summary: I stayed at a few hotels in this area but the bulk of my time was spent at this hotel....why?  Close to my client and great location for dining/shopping, GREAT staff (Derek and Jennifer were exceptional and always friendly/helpful...breakfast staff is amazing), made to order breakfast is complimentary for Diamond members and the omelettes were always awesome.  Rooms have an older feel, not much sound insulation and AC can be noisy depending on room. I am a sound sleeper so no big deal for me, pros greatly outweigh the cons. Wifi can be a little weak at times depending on guest utilization. Although the Courtyard is better in concerns to noise and style, the Hilton staff here is superior in every way. Summer is big travel team season so the noise level will rise
Manager Response: Hello Bill H,  Thank you so much for your great compliments. Yes Derek and Jennifer are great. Great service is one of the most important points of any hotel and we appreciate you calling that out. It also sounds like Elsa made your omelets - yes she is quite talented and I'l let her know that.  We look forward to serving you again.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a very nice hotel, convenient to restaurants, shopping and entertainment, and most important, our daughter, son-in-law and grand children. The staff were friendly and efficient and made a sincere effort to resolve our complaint about noise from the room above, caused by a very rowdy young child whose parents should have put to bed well before midnight. The room overlooked the pool and was otherwise very accommodating.
Manager Response: Hello 519sheldonp,  We appreciate that you have shared your great comments. Great Guest Service should always be maintained during your visit and I'm happy to hear that you have noticed that. Yes, we are very close to many shopping and dining options.  Hope that we get the opportunity to serve you again.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice stay for a good value
Summary: This was a quiet and comfortable hotel to stay in. There was plenty of parking in front of the hotel too.   It was close to food and shopping. It also gives you easy access to places throughout south orange county.
Manager Response: Hello Y7275APrebeccac,  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write this review. Yes you are correct, we are very conveniently located near many dining and shopping options. We are also close to many highways and centrally located between Los Angeles and San Diego.  We look forward to serving you again.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: What can I say... I'm impressed with the hotel and the room and the bed was comfortable and room very very modern and clean. And check in the helpfulness was perfect. And we had dinner Thur night and Kevin the chef made a perfect pasta with home made tomato sauce and came out to meet and greet the customer nice ! And the breakfast was made to request and perfect ! Why go and find a place to eat. Servers were outstanding ! And when we left sat they made a little care package to munch on driving back to Modesto ! Thanks to all for a wonderful time ! Will be back again. Ps change all the alarm clocks . Lol
Manager Response: Dear Hogcam,  Wow! What a great review and thank you for making it a point to post this. I am so happy that you slept well, found your room to be clean and had a great meal. Our staff are happy to be working here and it shows - thank you for pointing this out.   We look forward to serving you again and take pleasure in such.  With warm regards,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Love  our stay in this hotel , was shown to rest because it's quite , the room is clean and has modern design, breakfast was excellent too and our server Fedi  is very attentive. I will definitely coming back to this hotel
Manager Response: Hello Pamela M,  I'm so happy you loved this hotel! It was our pleasure serving you and we do look forward to serving you again soon. Thank you for calling out Fadi - yes we are happy to have him here with us. Did you know that you can have custom omelets with over 20 fillings?  Looking forward to serving you again.  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I got a same day booking deal since I was able to cancel a previous reservation at a different hotel that was nothing like in the pictures. I was glad my family and I enjoyed the stay. Lobby was clean and welcoming, and room was clean and comfortable. Only wish breakfast was included, since we had 2 kiddos and a $15 breakfast was a little exaggerated :)
Manager Response: Hello 315maritzac,  So happy to have served you. In the future let's consider a bed and breakfast room rate. Kids eat for free so that should help your budget, too.  Glad you liked our hotel. Hope to see you soon.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Everything was satisfactory except that I woke up in the middle of the night to loud footsteps coming from the floor above me. In the morning, there was a loud conversation going on right in front of my door as well as my window.  Buffet for $14.95 a turn off.
Manager Response: Dear corinas849,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I'm sorry about the outside noises you encountered while staying at our property. While our hotel is typically quiet with corporate clients regularly staying here, let's get you on the third floor for your next visit just in case.  Hope to serve you again.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is by far one of the best hotels I've been too. 5 stars to the staff! Angela was absolutely awesome and sweet to my elderly disabled mother in law. She took the time and had patience to exsplain everything from breakfast to the price of the room to her. Beautiful place! Nice atmosphere! Best staff ever! Thank you Angela and Michael (Manager) for a wonderful experience!! Love, Carresa
Manager Response: Dear Carresa Y,  I am so happy that we were able to care so well for your family! I am glad she liked her room and her breakfast. I'll be sure to commend my staff - thank you for mentioning.  Looking forward to serving you again.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Really great place to stay in Southern Orange County
Summary: We have business in the Irvine area twice a year and stay at Hilton properties.  Since some of the Hilton properties near Irvine (near John Wayne Airport) started to charge for parking, we looked a little more south of Irvine.  The Hilton Garden Inn was a little bit out but not that far from the Irvine Spectrum area where we had our business appointments.  We found this property to be very clean and the staff to be most welcoming.  The service was very good and we felt very much at home.  The room is nicely furnished and was very quiet on the 3rd floor.  As Hilton Honors members, we got the complementary breakfast and it was very good, with made to order eggs and pancakes or french toast; it was very tasty.  Parking was free, of course.  A nice shopping area is just a few blocks
Manager Response: Hello geotech522,  So happy to have served you! Yes our parking is complimentary and we are close to everything. Multiple highways, shopping and dining options are within walking distance or a short drive. Irvine Spectrum is about 10 minutes away, too. You'll find that we are conveniently very close to most corporate offices as well.  We welcome you back and look forward to cooking up a great breakfast for you.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: First visit here...was happy with my overall stay. Nice open lobby with free refreshments and drinks in the AM, and cookies at times! Staff was friendly and helpful. Room was clean. Will return! The breakfast was good as well.
Manager Response: Dear LabUnderachiever,  So happy you enjoyed your visit here. Yes, I love the cookies in the afternoon and complimentary coffee and tea station in the morning. Thanks for commenting on our helpful staff.  We hope to serve you again.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This Hilton Garden Inn is very close to Saddleback church and the staff are very friendly and pleasant towards their customers.  However, that is the only positives I can state about this Hilton brand hotel.  I attended a conference at Saddleback church from Wednesday to Friday in August 2017.  The rooms were kept clean and the room size were on par with other hotels in this category.  Throughout my stay, the hotel was probably less than 30% occupied, based upon the number of cars in the parking lot.  The complimentary internet they offer for their loyalty program (Hilton Honors) members is quite insulting.  I was barely able to get 2.5 mbps speed using my phone.  I thought I was doing something wrong, but it turns out that the complimentary internet speed is ridiculously slow.
Manager Response: Dear Carleton777,  It was our pleasure serving you and thank you for choosing our hotel. We also appreciate the time you took to review our property. Thanks for noting the Internet speed. We are upgrading our Guest Wi-Fi to a much more respectable speed and by the time you return, it will be in place. Had I known you were unhappy, I would have offered the Premium Speed complimentary, normally $4.95 per day.  We hope to see you again next year.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed two nights due to painting in our condo.  Our first choice was the Hilton Garden Foothill Ranch.  We knew that we would encounter great service, a clean room and excellent breaksfasts.  We would recommend this hotel and will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Steven H,  I am so happy that we were your first choice and even happier that we lived up to your expectation. We appreciate your review and I'll be sure our staff reads this, as this let's them know they are doing a good job.  Thank you, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Hilton Garden Inn in Lake Forest is a fine hotel, but we were traveling with my 2 year old daughter and had complaints about her running through our room.  So, if you are traveling during a week day, possibly not an ideal hotel for small children.  Next, for 2 days our rooms were not cleaned because they were fully booked and they were short staffed.  So they charged us for cleaning, but didn't do it.  Next, I had to confirm the room rate 2 different times because the higher room rate was applied to our bill 2 different times.  The breakfast buffet and the location is excellent.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Stay away from Traffic Congestion
Summary: Stayed at hotel while attending son's junior Olympics water polo tournament in Orange County; son stayed with the team at another Hilton Garden Inn; I chose this hotel to have a little more quiet, and to avoid some of the traffic congestion closer to the coast.  Outstanding stay; quiet rooms, great bed, (a must) helpful staff and a good value compared to other California options.  Very happy with my stay.
Manager Response: Hello Michael G,  I am so delighted that you had an excellent stay at our hotel. We are located in a quiet area but are still close to many highways, and dining and shopping options outside our doors. We enjoyed serving you and hope to see you again soon.  With warm regards, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: A Quiet and Delightful Place to Stay
Summary: My wife and I selected this property because we wanted to be away from the Disney crowds while visiting southern California. We found it to be very well managed with a caring and competent staff. As a bonus, the hotel serves breakfast, lunch, an dinner from an interesting and varied menu. Breakfast (not included in the room rate) is several cuts above the usual free buffet found in many hotels, and is prepared to order. We found all the food to be tasty, fresh and well-prepared. The room was of average size, but quite comfortable. Overall, the property is very quiet, even though it is located less than a block off a major highway.  Wi-fi is available in the rooms, but it is not an extremely fast connection. Higher speed can be purchased on a daily basis, but we did not find it
Manager Response: Hello Bill T,  It was our pleasure serving you and your wife. Yes we are away from the Disney crowds but still allow for easy access to Disneyland, Hollywood and San Diego attractions. While taking a break at our hotel, we are with in a very short distance of many dining and shopping options. Not only does our full service restaurant serve a delicious American style breakfast, we can also serve you dinner in the comfort of your well appointed room.  Thank you for reviewing our hotel and hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Excellent in every regard.  Rooms were very clean and well appointed. breakfast was a complete american breakfast.  Internet was complementary and stable.  the location was very good and freeways were easily assessable.
Manager Response: Dear frankcQ6223QG,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Our staff works very hard to maintain a consistent stay for our Guests. We do have a restaurant on-site that serves a complete breakfast and dinner, too. Yes, while Internet is complimentary, so is our parking and use of our business center.  Our location is central to many shopping, dining and highway options. Centrally located in Orange County between San Diego and Los Angeles counties, it's the right spot for everything!  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again.  Warm regards, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Had a nice three day stay. The king sized room at the end of the hall was spacious. The parking lot was quite full. I assume there were lots of guests,  but I was surprised that the room was very quiet.  What stood out was the excellent service we got when making a few special requests for pillows and other supplies. The breakfast was satisfying with cooked to order eggs, muffins, yogurt, fruit, coffee and juices.  Try other hotel apps to compare and get better prices than listed here on TripAdvisor.
Manager Response: Hello OKtrythis,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. It was our sincere pleasure serving you and fulfilling your requests. Know that you can get your special requests at breakfast, too. I just love having my eggs anyway and enjoying the freshness of our buffet. Being a business travelers' hotel, you'll typically find peace and quiet, yet we are close enough to shopping, dining and multiple highways.  Warm regards, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This was a very pleasant stay except the air conditioning noise and the house keeping were very slow and very unprofessional... We had to complain couple of times about the cleaning carpet and towels change
Manager Response: Hello U2020NCelenac,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so happy to hear that you had a pleasant stay. I do apologize for the lack of expediency on behalf of our Housekeeping department and serving your needs promptly. We appreciate this type of feedback as it helps us "gauge" our level of service. We hope to serve you again soon.  Warm regards, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The sincerity of the staff at this place blew me away.  Anyone can fake politeness and be helpful, but I felt that they all loved what they did, and wanted to make my stay as pleasant as possible.  Excellent overall experience
Manager Response: Dear jamessc0tts,  Thank you so much for your very kind words. Yes we do love what we do and we appreciate that you've noticed it. Our team will be so happy to see this!  Warm regards, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Love the Lake Forest, Rancho Santa Margarita area.  This is the best hotel for this area.  Location is close to everything and Hiltons are the cleanest brand of hotels you can stay in. The breakfast is made to order.
Manager Response: Hello Christy L,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. Yes, our location is central to many highways, shopping, dining and hiking options. I also love our custom made-to-order breakfast, too.  Warm Regards, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel with an awesome staff!
Summary: It was such a pleasure to be greeted by a warm and welcoming staff! From the minute we checked until we checked, out everyone was so helpful and friendly. The pool was great too! Thank you Sandi for making our stay special!
Manager Response: Dear DocnanLV,  I'm so happy to hear that your visit was excellent! Yes Sandi is so very welcoming and I'll be sure she knows you have called her out. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again in the near future.  Warm Regards, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay. Will return
Summary: Great place to stay whilst visiting my brother in calif. Close drive to all the places we love and fantastic rooms for comfort and cleanliness. Costs were of an acceptable level and I would definitely stay there again when we return.
Manager Response: Hello sandycraig2015,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel and thank you for your kind words. Yes we are central to many different destinations, right in the middle of an easy commute to either San Diego or Los Angeles.  We enjoyed serving you.  Warm Regards, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed here for one evening. Discomfort started with check-in. They charged us, ahead of time, for incidentals -- swiped our credit card with an amount -- rather than just taking a copy they would use, if required. Never had that happen before. Furthermore, the rate was different than we were quoted on-line, and we had the paperwork to prove it. They had a vague explanation, something about taxes. Were that the case, they need to update their website.  Then, there was breakfast. We were comped for breakfast, but the server didn't know that in advance, so it can't affect how we were treated. I tried to make myself a cup of tea, but the water was too cold -- colder than bathwater. I reported it to the server/overseer and asked for hot water. He brought me a cup, in reasonable
Manager Response: Dear 50ish_Mom,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I really am sorry for the "roller coaster" visit you experienced at our hotel. While credit cards must be swiped per PCI Compliance - copies can not be made - we should have better explained the rate discrepancy. I'm also sorry that your breakfast experience was well below our usual higher Hilton standards. My servers should be paying more attention to all Guests and replenishing the buffet more often. While this is not a typical experience at our hotel, I do invite you back in the future and I'll personally ensure your stay is perfect. Feel free to contact me directly so I may prepare for your visit.  Warm Regards, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Other than a minor billing issue, overall the hotel was clean, provided free water bottles at the front desk, and most of all, quiet!! I was able to focus on my work and not be disturbed by rowdy guests. Breakfast was good but NOT free. It was not too expensive. Oatmeal and fruit was $2.16. Good for me. No big frills but if you are looking for a quiet pleasant stay as a business traveler, this place is great.
Manager Response: Dear 511katherinev,  I am so happy that you were able to focus on your work and get it done. Yes this is a business traveler's hotel - so quiet is what you'll find. While we are tucked against rolling foothills, we are still accessible by multiple highways, and close to many dining and shopping opportunities. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again.  Warm Regards, Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: First time I choose this hotel.... It's nice and close to the office, too. Room was clean and they left me also a small treat for my late arrival....in the room.. really appreciated. Staff is nice and polite.
Manager Response: Hello Marco C,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am so happy that this was the right hotel for you. Yes we are close to many corporate offices nearby. We're also close to several shopping, dining and highway options.  We look forward to serving you again - it was our pleasure.  Thank you,  Mike S. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: A little trouble with the room rate at check-out and getting a light fixed - light was never fixed and room rate still didn't make sense at check-out.  Room was comfortable, very clean.  Shower was very good.  Lobby area had coffee and cold water, cookies p.m., and comfortable seating.  It was bright and cheerful.  Front desk personnel were very kind, as were the restaurant staff.
Manager Response: Hello Travelaunt58,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I'm happy to see that we were able to get the room rates sorted out for you.
