Thank you for giving us another opportunity to be of service to you.  I am delighted that we were able to win back your business and your trust.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Mix business and pleasure  and enjoy your stay by the pool, business center and a great gym. The service at this location is second to none.  Close to Starbucks, target, business office is across the street.
Manager Response: Gramen,  Thanks for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at the Hilton Garden Inn East Irvine/Lake Forest.     We hope to continue to be your hotel of choice when you are in the Foothill Ranch area of Orange County.     We sincerely appreciate your business!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: It's a nice and clean hotel in a quiet area, very good for business travel. One of the front desk employees, was asked to call me and check how I was because I had an accident and the employee told my friend that she did and I was ok when she NEVER called!!!
Manager Response: I appreciate the additional information you provided regarding the expected communication from our Front Desk team.  I will follow up on where the disconnect occurred.   I apologize for our failure to meet our commitment to you.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: The hotel was out of the way of the city traffic.  It was very easy to get to, and the setting was very quiet.  The food was very good overall.  In the morning, they had coffee hot and accessible for your drive.  Found the hotel very comfortable and I will stay there again on my next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide a review about your recent visit.  We are in a great location - easily accessible from John Wayne Airport. We are right of the 241 tollway which gets you to and from the Irvine area as well as to points south such as Mission Viejo.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: I checked into my room and noticed hair all over the floor which was apparent had not been swept by housekeeping.  I was given a different room, on the same floor (a few doors down) and found a Dorito chip under my bedside table.  I am so disappointed as I recommend this hotel to our business partners.  I won't be doing that again!
Manager Response: Gloria,  I am terribly sorry for the cleanliness issues you encountered during your recent stay. I assure you, such issues are atypical for our property.  I appreciate the details you provided and have reviewed them with both our leadership and Housekeeping teams.  We know you have a choice when you travel.  I hope that you will allow us the opportunity to demonstrate the level of service you so rightly expect from a Hilton.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel - too costly for location
Summary: Nice hotel, friendly staff.  175 for a weekday room in a remote location with the pool the size of a jacuzzi is way to high.  The street sweeper that runs in the parking lot will keep you up at night.  Your room view is also of a parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback on your recent visit.  Due to our location near so many corporate offices including Oakley, Cox Communications and Kawasaki, just to name a few, our weekday occupancy is high. We often run special rates, especially for our Hilton HHonors members.  If you are a Hilton HHonors member, be sure to ask if we have any special rates available.  I appreciate the information on the parking lot sweeper.  We have shared this information with a representative from the city.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights on business. Love the new pull down roller window shade. No more bright sunshine in the crack of the curtains to wake me up first thing in the morning! Thanks to this and a comfy bed, I'm enjoying some quality sleep while travelling, which is so important to me!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to Foothill Ranch.  I appreciate the feedback on our new roller shades and our beds. I am so happy that they contributed to a great night of sleep.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Business or Pleasure
Summary: This hotel was great overall. Location is fantastic if you are looking to stay there for business and have some access to trails for running or mountain biking. It's in a quiet spot and there's a few malls with food and beverage close but not so close as to cause extra traffic in the area. It's close to the highway as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Foothill Ranch.  As you mentioned, many of our guests enjoy staying with us as they love the opportunity to go explore the nearby trails.  We've got some great restaurants in the area.  Check out the Urban Grill and Wine Bar the next time you are in the area.  It is a great local spot.  We hope to see you on your next visit to the Orange County area.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, reasonably priced and a great location
Summary: My wife and I stayed here because it was centrally located to everywhere we wanted to go, it was a great price, the reviews were excellent and I have never had a bad experience at a Hilton Garden Inn.  We really enjoyed our stay everything from the comfortable bed/bright room to the wonderful breakfast was amazing.  I would defiantly recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Hilton Garden Inn in Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest!  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are located in a great part of Orange County - easily accessible to and from Laguna Beach, Irvine, Costa Mesa and Newport Beach.  Thank you for your loyalty to Hilton and the Hilton Garden Inn. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: This is Great Hotel for the Value
Summary: Near Restaurants and Movie Theaters. Shopping Centers all in Walking Near Residential Community  Hotel Was Clean Breakfast is Available Great Staff Very Friendly and Helpful right near Freeway Exit and Entry
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your visit to Foothill Ranch.  I'm happy that you had the opportunity to explore the area and that you enjoyed your visit with us.   We are fortunate to be located in the heart of the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: The only thing that I didn't like is that the breakfast was different for the softball teams. I like that it was in different room but didn't have what the regular complementary breakfast had.  It was nice having the other room
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  Our restaurant, the Garden Bar and Grille, serves breakfast daily.  We offer a full breakfast buffet for $14.95 that includes eggs made to order, including omelets, as well as made to order pancakes, waffles and French toast, fresh fruit, oatmeal and assorted yogurts as well as juice and coffee.  For groups, there are many breakfast options available at different price points.  We appreciate your feedback and would be happy to provide you with the different items available.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: I will definitely stay here again! The staff was very friendly and the room was comfortable, clean and beautiful. There were plenty of good restaurants around the hotel to eat at and easy to get to. Great !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. Our staff really appreciates your comments - you made their day!  The Lake Forest/Foothill Ranch area is a great spot. If you didn't get a chance to try the Urban Grille located just off Portola, make a point to try it on your next visit.  It is a great little neighborhood restaurant.  Again - thank you!  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest Caliofrnia was a great hotel to stay at. We were there for over a week, and the cleaniness of the hotel was good, breakfast was good, and customer service was great. The pool was always clean and the kids enjoyed it greatly. It was a little small, but perfect for the time we spent in it. The hotel is close to everything...from restaurants, beach, movies, local shops etc... It was a great experience and we will definitely recommend it to anyone we come into contact with or is going out West to California in that area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  I am so happy that you enjoyed your time with us. It sounds like you packed in all the sights while you were in town.  Foothill Ranch is a great spot that is a quick drive to many of Orange County's biggest draws such as Laguna Beach, Newport Beach and Huntington Beach.  We are also close to great shopping at the Irvine Spectrum, South Coast Plaza and Fashion Island. Plenty of things to keep everyone busy during an extended stay!  Thanks for your business and please come back and visit us!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: The staff at the Hilton Garden Inn - Lake Forest are wonderful!  The hotel is attractive, neat, and clean.  The hotel is surrounded by shopping and restaurants.  We had a 9-day stay, which could have been difficult, but this hotel and its staff make it very enjoyable!
Manager Response: Rebecca,  Thank you for the terrific review!  I am so happy that you enjoyed your NINE day visit with us. I'm delighted that our staff took such fantastic care of you during your time with us.  We are lucky to be located in the heart of Foothill Ranch.  There are a number of restaurants and shops in the immediate area as well as at the Irvine Spectrum which is just a short drive.  Again - thank you and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Like other guests had mentioned, the rooms and property are nice, well maintained and manicured. We traveled as a couple and utilized the online check-in on the HHonors app and chose a room on the top floor away from the elevator. We had a very restful stay. The room was spacious, orderly and spotless. The bed was very comfortable and the linens and towels were soft and fresh feeling. We didn't partake in the on-site eating options as we prefer to explore and eat out. The area is safe and away from heavy traffic areas, the property is around 7 miles east of the 5 Freeway among local businesses, corporate offices and car dealerships. We were here for the Duran Duran concert at Irvine Meadows and the Hilton Garden Inn was an excellent choice for our brief stay in Orange County. We
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent visit. We hope you had a great time at Duran Duran.  Irvine Meadows is a terrific venue - such a bummer that they are closing it!  Foothill Ranch is a great spot as we are close to many of Orange County's best spots. I am happy that our location worked for you and that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms.  We look forward to seeing you again!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: My third or forth time here, i'll be back, as a HHonors member it suits my needs and nice to stay at, rooms are nice, well organized, good laundry services, the pool area is very nice, what you see is what you get.
Manager Response: Tiran,  Thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors member. We appreciate your business and are happy to be your hotel of choice in the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area.    Thank you.  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: We haven't been here before, but so we can't really speak to the recent upgrades.  Very clean, nice lobby and lounge area.  Room was as shown on the website and the bed was very comfortable.  Really good shower.  The products (soap. shampoo, conditioner & lotion) are all Neutrogena which I really like.  No extra perfume or herbs, etc.  I felt very clean an refreshed afterwards. There is no restaurant on site.  The lounge area does have food, but there is not a proper restaurant.  But since we know the area, we ate elsewhere.  Great place, good rates, we will stay again! Close to many attractions in So Cal if you have a car. PS, try the afternoon free cookies, they are delicious.
Manager Response: Robert -  Thanks for taking the time to write a review about your recent visit. Now that you've had a chance to try us out, we hope to welcome you back frequently!  We do offer full breakfast service daily in the Garden Grille.  Our breakfast features a full buffet with fresh fruit, coffee, juice, assorted pastries, pancakes, waffles as well as eggs and omelets made to order.   As you mentioned, we do serve food in the evening.  The Garden Grille and Bar offers a full dinner menu served from 5pm to 10pm daily.  Thanks again and we hope to see you soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Stayed here five nights in July with three kids. Rooms were clean. Beds were comfortable. The staff was friendly. Down side is the bathroom door didn't close right. The people upstairs sounded like Giants. So ask for a top floor. And we are Hilton members and always stay at Hilton hotels. So it was disappointing that this hotel did not offer a free breakfast. You have to go a distance to find a decent breakfast. Pool and hot tub are really pretty  small. And there were smokers and drinkers in the hot tub in their pjs. Tried to take the kids swimming at night after a day out. Had to leave because it was not kid friendly.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to provide some additional feedback on your recent visit.    While it seems you enjoyed your visit overall, we definitely had some opportunities and I appreicate the details you provided.   For our Hilton HHonors Diamond and Gold members, complimentary breakfast is available for those who select it as part of their "My Way" welcome amenity.  We also offer several room packages that include breakfast.    Again - thank you for your comments.    Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Asked three employees before extra pillows were delivered. Our room was not cleaned on Saturday. The manager had to intervene to solve our problems. He finally at least brought us clean towels.  Rooms need to be inspected by management.
Manager Response: Please accept my sincere apologies for your experience.  I'm both frustrated and disappointed by what took place.  This is certainly not consistent with the level of service expected of Hilton Garden Inn.  I thank you for your feedback as it allows us an opportunity to review our practices and make the necessary adjustments.  We know you have a choice when you travel and we do hope that should travels bring you back to Foothill Ranch, you will allow us the opportunity to provide you the service i know we are capable of providing.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: This hotel is in between Hollywood and Legoland in Carlsbad City. Very close to the highway 405 and easy to drive from and to the hotel to various places in Orange county and Los Angeles county. I found parking spots available all time. Nice and quiet neighborhood.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your visit to Southern California! It sounds like you had an action packed visit!  Our location is great as we are right off the 241 toll road and close to the 5, 133 and 405 freeways which makes getting around much easier.   There is even an Amtrak/Metrolink station in Irvine that is about 15 minutes away from the hotel.  We hope to see you on your next adventure in Orange County.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Brought my family for a 4th of July weekend at the beach and found this hotel was a good location inland with convenient access to street or highway. Our stay was comfortable and without any issue. I overheard another customer who had some issues with their room, but the hotel staff was quick to make the necessary changes to address their concerns. We did not have time to enjoy the pool but it looked clean and inviting. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: John -   Thank you for staying with us over the 4th of July holiday weekend.  I'm glad that you enjoyed the hotel and our location.  We are fortunate to be located so close to so many fun activities in the Orange County area.  We have the Irvine Spectrum a few miles away and we are a fairly quick drive to Laguna Beach as well.     We look forward to welcoming you back soon and hope you have time to enjoy the pool on your next visit.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: The hilton garden inn was extremely accommodating.  The front desk staff pleasant the hotel was easy to find.  The rooms are newly remodeled and came out great.  Microwave and mini fridge alarm clock ironing board iron and free onsite parking and Wi-Fi will definitely return
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay.  We are so happy that you had a terrific stay and enjoyed our newly remodeled guest rooms.   In addition to all the amenities you mentioned, we are very fortunate to be located in the heart of Foothill Ranch.  We are close to a number of great restaurants and shopping, too.  We hope to be your hotel of choice whenever you are visiting the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Very clean and friendly hotel, staff was very friendly and informative. Was able to relax once checked in and loved the hotel for location and price. Beds were extremely comfortable. Hot tub was one to try and relax in after a long day of work.
Manager Response: Terry -  We are so happy you enjoyed your visit.   The next time you are in area, we hope you have the chance to check out some of the nearby restaurants.  Urban Grille is one of our favorites.  Also, there is great hiking in the area - a great way to relax after a day in the office.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Had a situation occur when we first checked in but was resolved with the daytime shift... Jessica, Regina and Michael were very helpful and was able to accommodate our request. Staff was really friendly and kind..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent visit.  We appreciate you giving us the opportunity to address your concerns. Jennifer took the lead and we appreciate you recognizing her for her efforts.  We know you and your group have a choice when you travel and we do hope that should your travels bring you back to the Foothill Ranch area, you will give us another opportunity to be of service.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Newly refurbished and very clean hotel with great service. I appreciated the Keurig coffee maker, ample Styrofoam cups and how well lit the room was. For a mid-price hotel I was very pleased with all aspects of my visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share some comments regarding your recent visit.  It is great to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated hotel and had the chance to try out the Keurig machine in your guest room.  We hope to be your hotel of choice whenever you visit the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: I love the people at this garden inn Jessica and michael always remember my room preference  my name they know the true meaning of service . have stayed many hotels as i am a diamond member and this is the best .
Manager Response: Thank you for your business and for being a loyal Hilton HHonors Diamond member.   Jessica and Mike were so pleased that they were mentioned by name.  You made their day.  Thank you!  We know you have a choice when you travel and we hope to continue to be your hotel of choice when you are in the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: A very nice hotel with friendly and courteous staff. Rooms are clean, with more than decent space. It's within walkable distance if you are up to some hiking and biking activities. Excellent breakfast service!
Manager Response: Hi Jimmy -  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so happy you had a chance to explore Foothill Ranch.   There are some great hiking trails just off the 133 in Laguna Beach that offer stunning views of the Pacific Ocean.   If you haven't tried those out - we highly recommend it.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice and clean, I like it
Summary: It's a nice Hilton Garden Inn, clean and comfortable like I expect from the brand. The only drawback is the floors seem kind of thin and I could hear the person on the floor above me walking around. So I'd recommend seeking to stay on the top floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your recent visit with us.  We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay and do thank you for your candid comments about the building itself.   We hope to be your hotel of choice when you are visiting the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area and certainly appreciate your loyalty to Hilton.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: The staff was great from check-in to check-out.  Very clean and the waiters at breakfast were great, polite and respectful.  The overall accommodations were very clean the fitness room was of great use too!
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit to Foothill Ranch.  Thank you for highlighting your breakfast experience. We offer a fantastic breakfast buffet with fresh fruit, breakfast pastries not to mention waffles, pancakes, eggs and omelets made to order.  It really is a great way to start the day.  We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Great customer service. Clean rooms, courteous staff, clean, great beds, easy to find, ample parking, close to restaurants, safe environment, quality hotel for the price. I would recommend this hotel not only for business but pleasure as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your recent stay.  We are very fortunate to be located in the heart of Foothill Ranch and adjacent to Lake Forest and Irvine.   Foothill Ranch has a number of wonderful restaurants and shopping as well.  We are happy you had the opportunity to explore the area.  Thank you for the terrific recommendation.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Great location, easy to find, shopping center nearby. Parking was easy. Quiet. Staff professional. Breakfast was excellent. Rooms quiet. Internet was good and no disconnects. Clean and modern. Area well lighted and no problems.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and had the opportunity to explore the area as well.  The Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area have so much to offer from great restaurants and shopping to hiking the nearby foothills.     We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Staff- Great Renovation- Great Price
Summary: I was very happy with this hotel and will be back. I would recommend getting a room away from the pool area, although the noise was very brief and very manageable. The Housekeeping staff was stellar. And the renovation was great. The beds were very comfortable and the rooms were spacious.
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review. I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit to Foothill Ranch.  We continue to receive positive feedback on our recently renovated guest rooms.  I was very happy to read that you liked our new look.  Thank you for your continued business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: Hidden Gem in Lake Forest, CA
Summary: Often I stay in either the Holiday Inn or Courtyard Marriott off the I-5 in Lake Forest/Irvine. However there is alot of traffic and congestion in the area. I decided to stay at the Hilton Garden Inn which is further east of the I-5, in Foothills Ranch in Lake Forest. While about 5 miles east of the I-5, it is a very nice property in a quiet location. Hotel is similar to other Hilton Garden Inn with a cafe, business center, pool and very comfortable guest rooms. When in the south Irvine area, I will return to stay in this hotel.
Manager Response: Mr. Chin -  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. I am delighted that our location met your needs.  Many of our guests enjoy staying with us for the very reasons you highlighted in your comments.  We appreciate the opportunity to be of service to you and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary: Newly renovated top to bottom makes this conveniently located hotel a must. Staff is courteous and welcoming.  No complimentary breakfast (Buffet breakfast priced a big high), but plenty of eating alternatives nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your visit.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed our new look. We have received numerous compliments on our renovation and appreciate your comments.     On your next visit, please be sure to check out our room packages that include breakfast.    Thank you for your business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Great location for Mission Viejo area.  Large rooms and very clean.  Beds are awesome!  Among the best I have ever stayed.  This is a solid hotel with an easy location to access.  Freeway is close as is several shopping centers.  Breakfast is adequate but good.  Rooms include Fridge and Keurig coffemakers which is a nice touch.  Sofa Sleeper in King room is nice for smaller children as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are fortunate to be located in a great part of Orange County.   We renovated the hotel in the first part of the year and the sofa beds were a new addition to rooms with king sized beds.  We have received terrific feedback on them thus far.  Again - thank you for the feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: The staff here is awesome. Always greeting you when you arrive and leave. The rooms are newly remodeled and very clean. Parking is very convenient as well and close to the entrance. You can't beat their breakfast. It's delicious and affordable at $13.99 for the buffet.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.    I am so happy that you enjoyed your visit to Foothill Ranch and that you liked our newly remodeled guest rooms.   We were really pleased with the finish product.  Our Front Desk and Food & Beverage teams really appreciated your comments. The best part of our breakfast buffet is that it includes eggs, omelets, pancakes and waffles to order in addition to pastries, oatmeal, fresh fruit and yogurts.  It really is a great value and we are so happy you enjoyed it.  Again - thank you and we look forward to welcoming you back!  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Wonderful hotel stay.  The weather was a little cold so we did not get in the pool but it looked like it would have been fun.  Would have gotten an excellent rating if breakfast was included but there is a great cafe close by that made up the difference.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us while visiting the Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area.    We have definitely been experiencing a little Southern California "May Gray" weather.  You will have to come back and visit us in the summer when it will be nice and warm.  When you come back, be sure to check our weekend room packages.  We have several that include breakfast, premium wireless and occasionally double Hilton Honors points.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: The staff was warm and friendly, gave me recommendations on local places to eat. Check-in/out process was quick and easy. Room was clean and comfortable.....did I mention the best pillows EVER! Seriously. I normally don't sleep well in hotels, but I got great sleep the whole week I stayed there. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us! I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay and equally important, slept well.  We are putting Dream Surrender II pillows in all our guest rooms. You are one of the first to try them out.  I am so happy they were comfortable.  Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Nice comfortable beds, friendly welcome upon arrival, great service for breakfast.  Multiple hair found on bath tub and bath sink drain clogged.  Notified front desk but she didn't seem concerned, like its the norm or she's herd it before
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. I am happy that you had a pleasant arrival and were able to enjoy breakfast in our Garden Grille.    I am terribly sorry about the issue you encountered in your guestroom. What you described is simply not to our standard.   I am disappointed in the response you received when you were kind enough to bring the matter to our attention. I apologize.  We know you have a choice when you travel and I sincerely hope you will allow us another opportunity to be of service to you.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: The staff was awesome!!  We brought a cake for my husband to share with the soccer team.  The staff (bar tender and desk staff) came out, asked if we needed anything, noticed that we didn't have forks (I hadn't even realized I'd forgotten them) and brought them out.  They truly bent over backward to make sure we were taken care of!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit with us.  There are a number of soccer events at the Lake Forest Sports Park and Recreation Center throughout the year.  We hope that we have an opportunity to be of service to you and the team again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: This hotel has always been a favorite of mine. The Gm Fernando doesn't miss a beat, Rick at the front desk so helpful and accommodating and last Barbara at breakfast is the most friendly customer oriented person I've Ever met.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! We really appreciate you taking the time to recognize our team members at the Hampton Inn.  Fernando, Rick and Barbara really enjoy what they do and your comments made their day.  We look forward to seeing you soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: I work for a Hilton Garden Inn aswell.. and this staff is just as friendly. Rooms were clean, well serviced when I went back the second day. I would definitely stay again. Oh and i love their coffee:)
Manager Response: Great to receive such awesome feedback from a fellow team member! I'm so happy you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms. We are really pleased with our new look.  Thanks so much and we will see you soon!  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Unfortunately we did not stay at this hotel. The hotel looks nice, but a particular experience with the Director of Sales kept us from booking any rooms. Speaking with him initially, he quoted us a group rate price in which he did not follow through. The first time he was contacted, he tried to inform us of a specific rate. Although we didn't book at that time, we informed him we would contact him in the future after a private discussion. He then took 3 days to return our call.......Actually I had to call him back. When he knew who I was, he stated he needed to go to a meeting, and he would call back. Two hours later, he called to inform us the rates were higher than previously discussed a few days prior. I feel the hotel rep was knowledgeable of our interest in the rooms,
Manager Response: Thank you for the candid feedback regarding your experience with our Director of Sales.   I expect our sales team to conduct themselves with integrity while at the same time ensuring that we are competitive in the market place.    I'm terribly disappointed that we failed to respond to you in a timely manner. While I can't guarantee that our rates would have met your requirements, I am certain that we could have managed this in a much more expeditious and professional manner.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Recently upgraded rooms.  The rooms are nice with amazing beds.  Microwave and fridge are a nice extra.  Hotel is clean and well maintained.  Hotel is very quiet.  Perfect for getaway weekend or business needs
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. I am delighted that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms.  We are quite pleased with the finished product and are so happy you are as well.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

I hope that you will allow us another opportunity to serve you and demonstrate the level of service I know we are capable of providing.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: A great place to stay on business or pleasure

For example we had a couple issues with the bathroom drains but they sent someone right up to help. The restaurant and bar didn't open until 5, however they had a well stocked fridge in the lobby and pointed us there. The location is a bit far from anywhere but close to freeway, so good on a stopover to OC/San Diego.

Summary Heading: Clean.  Modern.  Well maintained.  Some quirks.
Summary: Like all Hilton Garden Inns, this one appears quite new (although I know it is not), is well maintained, and generally a nice place to say.  That being said-  > The outdoor pool is small.  Swimming laps is a challenge of swimming circles.  > The hotel is wood frame construction.  So what do you care? If you have noisy neighbors upstairs, above you, you'll care.  The guests above me included 4 or 5  small kids, who seemed to like doing a lot of jumping around.  Boy, was it noisy.  > The bar does not open until 5pm, or when ever the bartender gets there.  >The "fitted" bed sheets, did not fit.  They were tearing at the corners they were so small (for the bed.) >The TV channel listing in the guest guide, was not right.  > Bathroom grout could use a little attention.

There is also a Keurig in the room with K-Cups of coffee (regular and decaf) and tea, which was a big win for me.  The downfalls were definitely there though as well.  The lack of a complimentary breakfast was a huge issue for me, as I am not willing to pay $13 for an all-you-can-eat breakfast . . . when all I want is a banana and a yogurt. Manager Response: Jenny H,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property and your time at Hilton Garden Inn Lake Forest. Summary Heading: Lake Forest Hilton Brand with a B & B Ambience
Summary: The Lake Forest Hilton Garden Inn is conveniently located near several high quality restaurants, Starbuck's and an array of retail shops yet not too far from Orange County Airport (about 20 minutes).  The staff are very accommodating and provide great service, getting taxis or Uber is fairly quick, and there are lots of place to walk, including near the famous Saddleback Church.  If you have time, take a night trip to Laguna Beach - gorgeous views of the coast and waterfront at dusk - about 20-25 minutes away but arrange your taxi back in advance or prepare for a 20 minute wait for one to be in the area. All in all, definitely a thumbs up property.

On-site convenience is the main reason to eat at the hotel restaurant for breakfast. Did not try dinner.

Summary: For a quick getaway will always come back here. close to home and the feel lke you are out of the state at a resort. very friendly and helpful staff.  the breakfast good have been a little better but the roomservice dinner for excellent and quick
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to let us know of your stay. We're happy to hear you enjoy our convenience to your home and the time your spend with us. Have a great weekend and we hope to welcome you again soon.  Regards,

Summary Heading: Fine for business but not for family
Summary: Checking in and out was easy, accurate, and quick.  While the rooms were clean, we had a queen room and a king room, the bathrooms and closets were tiny. They did provide a a mini fridge and Kurig for morning coffee in the room. They also had complimentary coffee in the lobby in the mornings but it was fairly bitter. They provided fruit infused water and cups in the lobby and chilled water and cups in the workout area.  The workout room was tiny and one of the two treadmills was out of order for the four days we were there.  The pool area feels like it is in the parking lot, but it was a clean area and seemed well kept. Clean towels were provided in the pool area.  The hallways had filthy carpet though and we noticed a tray from room service sitting out for 24 hours in our hall.
Manager Response: Beth,  Thank you very much for your feedback. We're glad you took the time to let us know the areas we can improve in and we hope we get another chance in the future. Have a wonderful weekend!  Regards,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for business
Summary: The hotel is clean and the staff very friendly.  The rooms are set up so that if you are staying for business you have a very comfortable workspace in the room.  The room service is quick, the beds are comfortable and the bathrooms are clean.
Manager Response: Leann C,  Thank you so much for the time and your review of our property. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your visit and are happy with our amenities and service. We look forward to your next visit! Have a great weekend!  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Our swim team just stayed at this hotel for the Fran Crippen Swim Meet in Mission Viejo. The staff was very nice and friendly as well as accommodating. The rooms were quiet and the beds were comfortable. The swimmers were able to get the rest they needed too.
Manager Response: Ncovelo,  We are very excited that you enjoyed your experience at our hotel. It is always a pleasure to see when we have large groups that stay with us that they get the rest they need to compete. Have a wonderful weekend.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Really enjoyed the layout of the room.  The fridge, micorwave and Kurig were great to have as I was traveling with a swimmer for a swim meet.  The front staff was friendly and we had plenty of parking.  My only complaint was the bed.  The King bed was as hard as a rock.  Two nights of no sleep.  When I mentioned this upon check out, I was told I could of adjusted the bed.  Who knew??  Why this was not told to me at check in was really disappointing and I did not see any information in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to let us know about your stay. I apologize our staff hadn't made you aware of our Sleep System adjustable King beds and I will share this feedback with them. I hope we get a chance to welcome you again in the future so we can ensure your stay is an enjoyable one.   Regards,  Scott

Summary: My daughters and I stayed here overnight for a class that they were taking in the area.  We had to get an early start the next morning and having a hot breakfast ready and waiting was extremely convenient.  The hotel was clean and quiet, the breakfast choices were ample and delicious and the staff made it very clear that they were there to assist in any way.  We had stayed at a very similar hotel the year before but it felt dirty and just not the same atmosphere of service.  Would not hesitate to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  Thank you so much for your kind review and I can't wait to share with our staff. I am happy to hear we made you and your family feel at home and we all look forward to your next visit. Have a wonderful weekend.  Scott

Summary Heading: Clean, Good experience for Business Trip
Summary: The room was clean, the front desk agents were helpful.   Internet speed was sufficient, but not fast enough to stream (the connection was consistently dropped, but this could have just been my room location).    Good location; I would stay at this hotel again in the future.
Manager Response: Chad L,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your experience with us. I'm pleased to see that we made you feel welcome and I will share your feedback with our engineering staff to fix any issues we may have with our internet connection. I hope we get to see you again soon and thank you once again.  Scott

Summary: This hotel is great for the value and comfort. The added service of a cooked to order breakfast adds to my overall satisfaction of this location. The staff was friendly and most helpful to assure my complete comfort.
Manager Response: Julie L,  Thank you very much for taking time on such a wonderful review. We are so pleased to hear that we make you feel comfortable while staying with us and can't wait for your next visit. If there is anything we can assist with for your next trip please let us know.   Regards,  Scott

Summary: I was on a business trip and found the FootHills Ranch Hilton Garden Inn a nice place to come home to after a busy day.  The people who clean the rooms are top notch. I enjoyed the hiking trails that you can get to from the back of the parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review!  We are delighted that you enjoyed your visit with us and had the opportunity to explore the local area.    I shared your comments with our Housekeeping team earlier today. You made their day - thank you!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Most of the Staff was great. Maid Service did not show up on Monday. The carpet in my room was noticabley stained and very gross.  During the weekend at breakfast the server was really not attentive. It wasn't busy that morning eaither.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay earlier this month. I'm terribly sorry that we failed to provide you with an experience consistent with what you ought to expect from a Hilton Garden Inn.  I appreciate the detailed feedback you provided.   Your comments assist us in identifying areas for improvement as well as training.   I hope that you will allow us another opportunity to demonstrate the level of service I know we are capable for providing.  We appreciate your business.    Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: We were in for a soccer tournament in Mission Viejo and this was a very nice option close by - about 4 miles from Mission Viejo.  It's in an affluent area with dining options, Starbucks, a movie theatre and stores near by. The hotel lobby area is very nice and the staff is very friendly. There is coffee/hot chocolate/tea and fruit infused water available as well as fresh baked cookies after 5 pm in the lobby.  The pool area is fine. There is plenty of parking too.  Again, this is not a resort but for the price it is a wonderful home away from home.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.  I'm so glad that our hotel met your needs.  We are very fortunate to be located near many of the sports facilities in the south Orange County area not to mention all the great restaurants.  I'm happy you were able to enjoy the Hotel's amenities. Please continue to make us your hotel of choice when visiting the Irvine/Lake Forest area.  Thank you for your business!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: This is an excellently run property that changed hands about 18 months ago.  The staff is very friendly and caring.  The rooms are large and comfortable.    The only issue is that the property needs an update in the hallways and rooms with respect to the carpeting.  It is getting a little old and is showing its age.  It could also use a little updating on painting to address the mars a chips.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  I appreciate you taking the time to recognize our associates. We have many associates who have been with us a number of years and they love to be mentioned in reviews.  Thank you!  Thank you for your comments on the hotel.  We are due for a renovation and are currently working on designs.  We hope to start the renovation before the end of the year.  We appreciate your business and look forward to being of service to you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, kind of tired, but well kept
Summary: Overall it is a nice facility in a more "quiet" area.  Very friendly front desk; one employee on duty and he checked in the three people in front of me so quickly, I felt like I barely waited. Key packets were ready for everyone at check in also.    The facility itself is tired especially the hallways, especially on the ground floor away from the lobby, with faded carpets, some discolored wallpapers, just a tired feel.   The room was spotlessly clean. It was quiet and comfortable. Furniture was all in great condition. The room felt a bit dated too but it was so well kept it was hard to tell.   The hotel appears to be undergoing a change in ownership which may explain some of the deferred improvements. In any case, a solid place to stay in a nice quiet area. The toll roads are
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.  I sincerely appreciate your feedback.  I shared your comments with our Front Desk team and they were delighted to be recognized for their speed of service.    I appreciate your comments regarding the condition of the property. We are due for a renovation and are currently working on the design. We hope to get the project underway before the end of the year.  Again - thank you for the review. We look forward to being of service to you again in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and nice staff
Summary: what can I say. Title says it all. My wife and I stayed here do to our house getting exterminated. We wanted to be close to home. This hotel offered a very nice breakfast!!! Omelets and eggs to order, sausage, waffales, all you could eat. Not your regular hotel dine and dash. We sat enjoyed our brunch 7-11 , read paper, and wend back to room. Free wifi, lots of security since OC Sherff just build their new substation across the way. Very nice neighborhood, close to movies and restuarants. This place is empty on Sunday. Basically a business hotel. Nice pool and spa, computer room
Manager Response: Michael B,  Thank you once again for taking time to let us know we are a comfortable place away from home. We take pride in keeping our property as welcoming as possible and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Definitely recommend.  My wife and I stayed here on a Saturday night after a long drive from the bay area and were pleased that the hotel met all our expectations.   Very clean rooms and bathrooms.  Quiet and easy to get to.  The wi-fi works well.  Its a treat to have a Keurig machine in the room.  This takes place of those outdated "Coffee Machines" that can be very messy. Nice.  There is also a microwave and small refrigerator to keep water chilled.  Did not have a chance to use the pool or the restaurant, but they appeared very acceptable.  Very good value.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay. I'm please that our amenities were on par with what you expected and next time you have a chance to enjoy our pool and restaurant. Have a great day and thank you again for your time.

Summary: I have no complaints about this hotel.  It is an excellent place to stay.  It is close to stores and restaurants.  Staff is friendly, facility is modern and clean.  We did not try the breakfast, but it looked delicious!  We already have reservations to stay here during another trip we will be making back home.
Manager Response: Tara L,  Thank you very much Tara for letting us know of your visit. I am pleased to hear we met your expectations and we look forward to welcoming back during your next visit. Please let us know if we can assist in any way with your reservation. Thank you again and have a wonderful day.

Summary: When visiting Disneyland, we tend to stay at hotels away from the park due to the high cost of staying near the park. We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn this last weekend and we are glad we did. Both of the people we interacted with at reception were friendly and helpful. The room was clean, with the exception of hairs on the bathroom floor and soap holder in the bathtub. The beds were comfortable and they had room darkening shades which are nice. The lobby was decorated nicely and welcoming. And a true bonus when traveling in Southern California--free parking!!!! This was a true bargain for us and we would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dieterbean,  Thank you very much for your time to let us know of your stay. We are happy you enjoyed your time with us and I will pass along the condition of the bathroom to our Director of Housekeeping to ensure these issues are not overlooked. I hope we get a chance to see you again soon and have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest
Summary: This was a bargain for Southern California. We stayed Friday Night through Sunday Morning. Wilson at the front desk was great and he recommended a great restaurant nearby, The California Fish Grill. He was right about generous portions and reasonable prices for fresh fish. Mac who served us at breakfast in the lobby breakfast area was nice and did an excellent job as well. The king size bed was very comfortable. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Kerby S,  Thank you very much for your review of our property. It is always great to hear feedback of our employees who make the guest stay that much more enjoyable. I will pass along your kind words to them and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Hotel is located in a small industrial park just 5 miles off I-5 or seconds from the toll road.  Located just north of the hotel is a shopping mall and many restaurants.  Though we were not really satisfied with the breakfast all other aspects of the hotel were excellent.  Great place to stay if you are attending a concert at the Verizon Amphitheater.
Manager Response: Michael H,  Thank you for taking time to give us some feedback of your stay with us. It looks like you enjoyed yourself and I'd love to hear more about your breakfast experience to better our service and quality. Please feel free to reach me directly at the hotel. Thank you Michael and have a great day.  Scott

Summary: I stay in this hotel for 10 days for business. The room was spacious and clean.  The bed was comfortable. The breakfast buffet was sufficient and the staff were very helpful and friendly.  The gym is on the small size and so is the swimming pool.  You need a car to get to anywhere.  There is nothing in the area to visit, only businesses.
Manager Response: Christel,  Thank you very much for taking time to let us know of your stay with us. 10 days is a long time to be away from home and your feedback regarding our facilities makes us aware of improvements we can certainly look into. Thank you again have a great day.

Summary: This is a great hotel.  I have stayed here on multiple occasions.  I always have a great stay.  The rooms are very clean and quiet.  The internet works great.  There are restaurants and a grocery store nearby.  Plenty of parking
Manager Response: Michael B,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your stay with us. We can't wait to see you again soon and please let us know if we can help out with any travel arrangements. Have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Great Rooms for Relaxing after Business
Summary: Traveled for work to this property.  Extremely clean, nice sized rooms, comfortable lobby, and great cook to order breakfast.  After working all day it was nice to come "home" to a nice, clean room and relax.  Nice atmosphere in the lobby for socializing with other travelers.
Manager Response: Tara H,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your time with us and will pass along your feedback to the staff. Please let us know if we can help in any way with your next visit. Have a great day.

Summary: Extreme value for the buck. Crispy clean sheets. friendly and efficient staff. I slept like a log as there was no noise other than the humming from the air conditioning. The cleanliness in all areas was excellent.
Manager Response: Mr. Miguel C,  Thank you very much for the 5 star review! I can't wait to share your comments with the staff and we all look forward to seeing you again very soon! I hope you have a great weekend and thank you for your time.  Regards,  Scott

Summary Heading: They could've left the light on
Summary: ..well this is a Hilton, not a Motel 6. Still, I had called them in advance letting them know I was still stuck in Los Angeles and would be arriving a little late. At that time they noticed my special request for upper floor and were able to put me in a room on the 3rd floor. Upon arrival it was already after dark and I check in. They tell me the room number and where to go to get to said room. Upon opening the door I was greeted with a dark room. Fortunately, there was a working light switch next to the door.  The room was very clean. A couple things that surprised me were the old school under the window Heating and A/C unit was now controlled with a wall thermostat. The unit was rather noisy, but that didn't bother me. I can sleep through pretty much anything. The other was a
Manager Response: Al H.  Thank you very much for taking the time to let us know of your stay with us. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed yourself for the most part and we love having your feedback concerning our property so we can improve our guests experience. Please let us know if we can help with any future reservations and we look forward to seeing you again. Have a great day!  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Traveled to California for business and brought a few friends along. Booked this hotel the day before and couldn't have been happier with my choice. The location was phenomenal, but it was the staff that really made the biggest impact on us. Nathan was one of the friendliest front desk agents that I've dealt with in quite a while, and he had no problem helping us with a few minor requests. The entire staff was excellent and there is no doubt that I'll be staying here again when I return to the area.
Manager Response: Blake L.,  Thank you so much for your kind review of our staff and of course Nathan. He is a true asset to our property and I have shared your feedback with him already. I'm pleased to hear you'll be staying with us again on your next trip and please let us know if we can help with any arrangements. Have a great rest of your weekend.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: I met great acceptance especially Chinese madarin services and her kindness help throughout the whole stay. She help us with very help full and convienence service making us feeling at home country. Parking area is wonderful. They help us with package acceptance for free. What's more, they deiver the package to my room. This make me such a thankful feeling.
Manager Response: Dear Ruiwei L.  Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your experience with us. I will be pleased to let Sandi know how helpful she was with your stay and we love to hear comments like this. We all look forward to your next visit and please let us know if we can assist in anyway with your planning. Have a great weekend.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Very pleased with our stay & the price we paid for the hotel. I do wish it would include breakfast, but it never hurts to try an out of town Denny's. My first rooms A/C did not work. They moved our room right away. From there I had not complaints. If the A/C in the first room was working we would have been fine there. I am very big on reading reviews before trying. I am glad I took a chance on this hotel despite some of the reviews. Why complain about stained floors? That's not where your sleeping. The bed was GREAT. We were convinced that it was memory foam. If we ended up in the same area and needed a hotel I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa,  Thank you very much for the great review! We are so pleased that your stay was pleasant even after the a/c issue and we handled your concerns right away. Please let us know if your ever in the area again I'd love for you to have breakfast on us! Have a wonderful evening.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Great location for servicing Foothill Ranch/Lake Forest area businesses.  I felt the bathroom could have been cleaner.  Front desk staff was friendly.  Was there supposed to be table service for breakfast?  If so, I didn't get any.  I'm not really sold on the adjustable beds, they seam rather "lumpy."
Manager Response: Dear Steven J L,  Thank you very much for your feedback of your stay at our property. I'm sorry your breakfast experience wasn't up to our standards and I will share your feedback with the staff to ensure this doesn't happen in the future. We also take great pride in the cleanliness and will again share with staff so we can improve our overall guest satisfaction. Have a great evening and we hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: The Hilton 24 hour cancel policy is a real problem. This really limits my flexibility. My business travel is made up of sales calls on customers who are located in states from coast to coast. When I am out for a week I am staying in a different city every night. There are those occasions when a customer will send an e-mail to cancel a meeting and I am forced to make a number of last minute changes which sometimes require that I change the city and hotel. For that reason I avoid Hilton whenever possible.
Manager Response: Dear Harold G ,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us on TripAdvisor. It is never our intention to disappoint our guests in any way, and I am sorry you feel that way about our cancellation policy; but I’m glad I got a chance to talk to you over the phone and resolve the issue. I do hope you will reconsider staying with us and I invite you to contact me directly to personally see to your reservation. We would love having you here!  Regards, Scott

Summary: The room I stayed in was clean and tidy. Basic amenities, including a desk for getting some work done.   Free wifi, with pretty reasonable speeds.  Plenty of free parking in front of the hotel.   Nice friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your time and response about your stay with us. I am pleased to hear that our staff and property were up to your standards. I hope we get to see you again on your next visit to Foothill Ranch and please let us know if we can assist in any way with your trip. Have a wonderful day!  Regards,  Scott

Summary Heading: Clean hotel, courteous staff but some issues
Summary: The Hilton Garden Inn at Lake Forest is a nice hotel overall with very courteous staff.  However, it falls behind from a value perspective - breakfast is not included unlike many hotels in the area and costs $12.95.  Also, the pillows are extremely uncomfortable and combined with the noisy AC, makes it very difficult to get a good night's sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time for your response. Your feedback is certainly valuable to us and we take pride in our ongoing preventative maintenance program that correct all a/c issues and I apologize your stay was affected by the noise and comfort of the pillows. Please contact myself during your next stay and we can talk about our cook to order breakfast.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: No hitches.  Pleasant staff, clean room, comfortable bed, nice breakfast.  No complaints.  I stayed at a Hilton (not a Hilton Garden Inn) the next night:  no breakfast, less convenient room, had to pay for parking, less friendly staff.  I'll always opt for a Garden Inn in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time for your response. I'm pleased to hear that our staff and property is up to your standards and we look forward to your next visit. I hope your feedback can open some eyes what a pleasant experience one can have with the HGI brand,  Thank you once again for your time and have a great day.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Stayed at this hotel off and on over a 6 week period.  The staff was excellent. Always friendly and very helpful if any problems arose regarding the room.  Sandi at the front desk was exceptional. Can't beat this location. Away from the congestion of most of Orange County but with close access.  Next trip to the area, this is where we will stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time and your 5 star review! I'm pleased to hear that we can host your future visits and we look forward to making every stay and enjoyable experience. I think you nailed it with Sandi at the FD. We are very lucky to have a personality like her as any property would be and I'll pass along your kind words. Thank you again for your time and see you soon.  Regards,  Scott

Summary Heading: Excellent staff, quite and clean hotel
Summary: Needed a one night stay before catching flight from SNA. Found staff to be very helpful. Room was clean and smelled fresh. Overall, hotel look was impressive. Breakfast staff also very professional. SNA was about 20 min drive so planned accordingly. Highly recommended hotel.
Manager Response: Mohammad,   Thank you very much for taking the time for a short response. I'm happy to hear our property was a comforting experience and so close to where you needed to be. We are lucky to have a great housekeeping and restaurant staff and I'll pass along your feedback. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day.   Regards,  Scott

Summary: The location was great. Very friendly staff. Bed was uncomfortable bathroom door was dirty. Housekeeping kept forgetting to leave soap behind for all seven days we were there. Overall it was a nice place to stay at.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your time and feedback regarding your stay. I apologize for you room being overlooked for basic amenities and I'll share with our Director of Housekeeping to ensure this isn't an issue in the future. We hope to have you back again soon and I can assure you your next visit will be an enjoyable one.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Very nice hotel, very clean, comfortable. Everything in the room. Staff more than welcoming. Had cookies on desk too. Free parking. Nice appearance of hotel. I always try to stay at Hilton properties.
Manager Response: Bobby H,  Thank you very much for taking the time for your review. I'm pleased to see that on such a special time of year you and your family had a pleasant time while staying with us. It's great to know your loyalty to Hilton is runs deep and we look forward to you next visit.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Hotel is on a foothill and the employees treat you like good family.  Very close to good restaurants, work, good churches.  Clean, quiet, full service, very good.  Very nice breakfast at a surprisingly good price.
Manager Response: Mr. Devries,  Thank you very much for your great review and the compliments on our staff. We are pleased that we fit your needs with our location as well as making you feel at home. Our staff looks forward to making every guest feel like they're in a comfortable place and we all look forward to your next visit.  Regards,  Scott

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, if you find yourself in Lake Forest
Summary: We were looking for a Hilton near Laguna Niguel- this wasn't as close as we'd have liked, but it was very nice and a great bargain!  I also highly recommend Chocxo- a lovely chocolate and coffee shop right down the street, and Cinnamon Productions Bakery on Auto Plaza Drive!  Both delicious, inexpensive, and comfortable . . .
Manager Response: Orrin C,  Thank you very much for taking the time for a response. I'm pleased to hear that although we were a little further away from the action we still had plenty to offer. Those are all great choices and I'm glad you made us one of them. We hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: As we arrived we were greeted by the assistant manager Nathan.  Nathan went out of his way to make my daughter had a wonderful birthday weekend!  I never had front desk managers care about the guests' with a smile and make it so easy and pleasant to talk with --just like family! We will come back again, with our family from out of town.
Manager Response: Dorothy,   Wow, thank you very much for taking the time for a great response and especially mentioning Nathan. We are a very lucky to have Nathan as part of our team and even more exited you and your daughter had a great experience as well. We look forward to seeing you again soon and I hope you have a great day.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: As we attended a function in the area, we looked for a reasonable hotel in the area. What a find! Nice size room, very clean, very comfortable bed!, and free wi fi. The staff was friendly and we checked in with another couple in less then a minute....Highly recommended, and we will be back if we are in the area.
Manager Response: Ronwol,  Thank you very much for taking the time for a response. We are pleased that we were able to offer you a clean and comfortable place that made your stay a pleasant experience. I will pass along your kind words to our staff and we all look forward to your next visit. Have a wonderful rest of your day.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Very clean, comfortable beds.  Quiet rooms, clean bathrooms.  I will be back.  This hotel was above average from the drive up to the check in and check out.  Everyone was very professional and helpful.  I was very happy to stay here and wish I could have stayed longer.  The staff was very helpful with directions and the location was worth the drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time and your pleasant review! I am always excited to hear of our guests experiences go as well as they do and hopefully since being just a couple of hours south we will see you again soon and you stay won't be as short. Thank you again for your time.  Regards,  Scott

Summary Heading: Outstanding care and concern for their guests!
Summary: I booked a room here for my children on their Thanksgiving visit. They were able to check-in Early on Thanksgiving and given Breakfast! Huge bonus having outstanding care and concern for your guests. I would highly recommend this place to my family & friends! Great area and just off the 241 toll road, so easy travels in Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time for your review. I'm pleased to hear that our property and staff were able to accommodate your family at such a pleasant time of year and I sure hope we get to see  your family again soon. We take a lot of pride in what we have to offer here and this feedback makes it all worth it. Thank you again for your time.  Regards,  Scott

Summary Heading: GREAT HOTEL, FREE WI-FI, FREE PARKING, FRIENDLY STAFF
Summary: We stayed the night on Thanksgiving.  We were very impressed with the property and the staff was fantastic....especially considering it was Thanksgiving and they were away from their families.  We had room rate that included breakfast at The Great American Grill onsite which was very good.  Highly recommended hotel for the money.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time for your review. We couldn't be more pleased that you all had a great experience and you recognized our staff. I will pass along the news that our passion for our guest experience is paying off with feedback like yours. Thank you again for your time.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: $89 for the a night stay with internet only, there is no  value.  You can find hotel nearby with more to offer to its guest, it charges similar dollar amount.  The hotel decoration makes you feel cold;  window curtain is only for decoration, it can't be closed during day and night, so you have to put up with either day light or street light.  If your room is situated on the ground level, you are guaranteed with no privacy.  The sound insulation is not great.  Throughout night time, you can hear next door guest flushing toilet and watching late night TV program, and more...
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I apologize that your experience was a little less than pleasant and I hope we get the opportunity to earn your business back in the future. Although the property lacks in some areas we take great pride keeping it clean and comfortable for all to enjoy. I can ensure we have the room issues taken care of with our preventative maintenance program that our engineers do on a daily basis to keep our property as clean and safe as possible. Thank you once again for your feedback and we hope to see you again.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Came to the Garden Inn for a wedding and got a great deal from the wedding couple. It was perfectly adequate and provided all that was needed. There were a two nights of strange instances with a man who may or may not have been on drugs and was not staying at the hotel and he was escorted out by the police. But other than that it was fine.
Manager Response: Lindsey R.,  Thank you very much for taking the time out to review our property. I can ensure our guest safety is our number one concern and although very rare unfortunate things happen from time to time. At no point I hope you felt uncomfortable because we have a great relationship with our community and the city. Hopefully your next visit will be and pleasant and enjoyable experience and I'd like to thank you again for your time.  Regards,  Scott

Summary Heading: Nice clean room but no breakfast
Summary: The room was nice and clean. In addition, they had adjustable comfort mattresses. They Kuerig coffee makers in the room.  We were very disappointed that they charged for breakfast. The website sounds like breakfast is included. Next time we will stay at the Hampton Inn next door.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay with us. I'm pleased that you enjoyed all of our amenities and comfort but fell a bit short on the breakfast. Our property has the luxury of a full cooked to order breakfast which isn't available at other properties in the area and we hope to win you back on your next visit. Thank you once again for your time have a wonderful day.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Yeah, it's worth it's stars. Halibut I had last night was a bit overcooked. Carpet by the door was a bit dirty. But.. it's only when things went sour on my trip that I really came to appreciate the staff. Awesome. If not for the room, I'd have given it 5 stars. They really went out of their way to help. Extremely friendly, and helpful.  And for the most part, the room was decent as well. Great shower + hot water, bathroom was modern, usual services like complimentary internet + easy free parking close to the front door. Room was spacious and otherwise very clean. All in all, I'll be coming here again for biz!
Manager Response: Hello Avner,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay with us. I'm pleased to hear you had a comfortable time with us and aside from the experience with food and condition of carpet all was great. We have a preventative maintenance program that our engineering staff goes through on a daily basis and will have the carpet shampooed immediately. Thank you once again for your feedback and hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: My family  had a wonderful experience at the Hilton Garden in Lake Forest. The staff was friendly, accommodating and made us feel like famly. The rooms were very spacious and reasonably priced. Each morning we at breakfast at the restaurant downstairs because of the variety of food options. We made use of their laundry facility and the weight room was very well equipped. Most of all, we felt right at home
Manager Response: Hello Kathy,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am so pleased to hear our property was a welcoming experience for your family. I will share your kind comments with our staff and we all hope to see you again soon. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: First of all, I am a Hilton diamond member, so I am quite familiar with the standard of service that this chain normally provides. Last night however, I ordered room service here and I was extremely disappointed. Not only did my food take over an hour to arrive to my room, but my sandwich was freezing cold, so were my fries. My coke was watered down, warm and flat. The worst part was the shrimp cocktail. Whatever genius put that together used RAW, UNPEELED SHRIMP as opposed to cocktail shrimp which come pre-cooked and ready to eat. I asked for the shrimp cocktail to be taken off my bill, then I never heard back from my server. Nobody called my room to make amends either. Very unprofessional and inconsiderate. Horrible customer service. This is a very poor first impression of
