I will use this as a learning tool for myself and our staff to ensure this doesn't happen again. I will reach out to you and hope to earn your business back and being a loyal Hilton Diamond member should never had to go through this experience.   Regards,  Scott

Summary: Have been staying at this hotel for years. Close to my company HQ in Lake Forest and situated in a quiet area near Foothills retail outlets. Staff are always friendly and courteous. Hotel dining is good and potion sizes are large. Food selection is decent with some typical American classics, Burger, Ceaser Salad and Pasta.
Manager Response: Hello Steve,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are happy to hear of your loyalty to us and we all take great pride in making our guests feel as if they were at home. We look forward to your next visit and please let us know if we can make it any better. Thank you again for your time have a great day.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Night before stayed at Hampton Inn in Corona/Riverside which I will never do again.  This Hilton Garden's room were better kept and the staff professional and helpful (Nathan).  Just had the feel that they cared about the guests and job there were doing.  Hotel is off the main road a little but is better - little traffic and no noise, or over head planes.
Manager Response: Hello Todd,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay with us. I know that Nathan is one of our stars here and I'm pleased to hear we exceeded your expectations. Our staff is always eager to please and we are very happy to be a part this team. Thank you again for your time.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Shower was freezing, you would think they would have back up water heaters or just not book the rooms that are affected by the broken water heater. They also could have warned us when we checked in so that we knew what we were getting into. After two connecting flights I was really looking forward to a hot shower!
Manager Response: Hello Ryan,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay with us. I apologize for the experience you had and we will use your feedback as a learning tool so this will not happen in the future. If I can help in anyway with your next visit to the area please let me know and I'll assure you won't experience the same issues. We take pride in our property and this feedback will be shared with our staff. Thank you again for your time.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: I came to this location because of a charity bike ride I was doing; I wasn't much concerned about the hotel as a leisure experience, but I was pleasantly surprised that the room was very nice, the food decent, and the service great. A great value!
Manager Response: Kirsten,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay with us. I'm pleased your mini vacation turned out to be a more pleasurable experience than expected. We love to have a great value around such great amenities our hotel has to offer. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Room was not up to what I thought a Hilton should be. The beds were poor for sleeping and noise could be heard from next door and the room above.  The breakfast said complementary so I felt it should be free not 13.00 dollars
Manager Response: Hello John,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay with us. I'm very sorry that your stay was less than what you expected and I hope we have the opportunity to earn you business back in the future. We take a lot of pride in our hotel and if I can help in anyway with your next visit to our area I'd love to make your time with us as enjoyable from what you'd expect from Hilton. Thank you again for your feedback and have a wonderful day.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: We spent only one night at the hotel and we had a very good experience. Staff was very helpful and checked us in early. The room was very clean and quiet.Good bed with comfortable mattress and pillows. We had the complimentary breakfast which was excellent. All the staff was very friendly.Would definitely stay again if we will be in the area.
Manager Response: Hello Maria,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay with us. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your time here and that our beds made it that much more comforting. We look forward to your next visit and let us know if we can help out in anyway.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Hilton Garden Inn in Foothill Ranch, CA is an excellent hotel to stay at for business or pleasure. Rooms are very clean and the service is wonderful. Please ask for Wilson at the front desk when you arrive. He will make sure you will not regret your stay. He is very helpful and professional.
Manager Response: Gary,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay with us. I know that our staff will enjoy your comments and Wilson is such a great team member we are very lucky to have him. Thank you again for your feedback.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: A great place in Central Orange County.  I am a Marriott for Life member but was forced to stay here at the Hilton and was glad I did.  Clean friendly fast and convenient describe this stop over.  I highly recommend you consider this Hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Alex,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay with us. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed yourself and we hope to have won you over and we get see you again on your next visit to the area. Please let us know if we can help in anyway with a future stay.  Regards,  Scott

Summary Heading: Overnight is fine, but for 2 weeks, definitely not worth it.

For an extended stay, though, there were many things that gnawed at me.  Housekeeping did not do the room like I was a one night stay - didn't always have new cups (paper mind you), the thermostat was turned up, left old coffee ,keurig, in the maker, and never emptied the water in the ice bucket. The shower pressure was horrible, not enough to have a full streatm out of the faucet! Room did not have suffice lighting - hard to see in the evening. Breakfast was $12.95!! You'd think paying $129/night would at least get you that!  But, room service had

We take great pride in our hotel and we can use your feedback as a learning tool and improve. Thank you once again for your time and hope we can earn your business back in the future.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: We stayed 4 nights while we visited our grandkids who live in the area. We were greeted by a friendly smile and our room was ready even though we were early for check in. Lobby and room were very clean and welcoming to us. Housekeeping had our room cleaned and ready for us upon every afternoon when we returned for a rest. Only issue we had was their restaurant ...good if you are in a hurry, but no big deal. Thus property is a great place to stay...clean, quiet and the staff is great!
Manager Response: Hello Mike,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. We're pleased to hear your family time was enjoyable and you were comfortable with our hotel. We take a lot of pride in the comfort of our guest while they're away from home and we hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: This is my favorite hotel in the Irvine area. It is a standard HGI and always meets my expectations. The staff are helpful and friendly, the food consistent and the rooms of a good size. My only slight gripe about the room I was allocated (300) was a funky/moldy smell and a ripped curtain but apart from that the stay was fantastic. The hotel is close to a number of food and shopping areas. I will be staying here next time I am in the area on business.
Manager Response: Hello Tim,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed yourself and apologize for the condition of your room. We take great pride in the upkeep of our hotel and have a running preventative maintenance program done on a daily basis. I'm sure our staff has those issues taken care of and we look forward to your next visit. Please let me know if I can assist with your next visit to the area.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: it was value priced and the rooms were lovely. The staff were very helpful. Having the restaurant on the premises was an added bonus as we didn't have to drive to find breakfast. The location suited our needs.
Manager Response: Neil,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. We're happy to hear your family enjoyed our amenities and we hope we'll be able to host your next trip to the area. Have a wonderful day.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Great hotel, friendly staff, quiet and well-maintained rooms along with fast and free internet.  My first stay at Hilton in a while.  The hotel staff was very accomodating.  Centrally located for Irvine business.
Manager Response: Jamess,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. We are all pleased to hear that you enjoyed our staff as well as our clean and comfortable hotel. We hope to see you again soon and have a great day!  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Extremely helpful staff, brilliant breakfast service and such a wide choice. Its a bit out from central location but has good network roads. Very close to shops & restaurants. Would recommend to anyone for a stay. Very close to SNA airport
Manager Response: Alilreland,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your time with us and our breakfast offerings. A nice cooked to order breakfast is always a great way to start the day. Thank you again for your time.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Clean, fresh property with outstanding staff.  Miss Cindi and Mr. Nathan are the stars of this outstanding staff.   This property may be a little off I 5 and off the beaten path but there are good shopping and restaurant choices nearby as well as a movie theater.   Oakley's home office with an outlet is right up the hill as well.

I'm sure everybody who has visited us and had the pleasure to deal with Sandi and Nathan know exactly what you're talking about. They are a true value to our team and we're all pleased that you enjoyed your stay.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: The facility was convenient, easy to find and very well kept. It has a restaurant however there are many nearby restaurants that offer a greater variety of food. There is a pool and hot tub and  exercise room .
Manager Response: Hello Bud,  Thank you very much for your time to review our property. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed our hotel as we all take great pride in our guests experience. Manager Response: Harlon,  Thank you very much for your time and review of our property. I apologize your time with us was less than what you expected and plan to share with our staff. Feel free to contact myself if I can help in anyway with your next visit and I assure you we'll make it better. Thank you again for your time.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: This was our first experience at your location, and we had a most enjoyable time.  The atmosphere was inviting, and warm.  The staff likewise.  The amenities were excellent!  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! And will recommend it to our friends and family! We thank you for making our stay most comfortable and relaxing!
Manager Response: Mario,  Thank you very much for your 5 star review. I'm pleased to hear you and your family made the most of their stay with us. We try our best to make every guest experience a great one and I'll pass along your remarks to our staff. Thanks again for your time.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel on many nights because it is a great location for our soccer tournaments.  It is right off the 241 toll road and close to many restaurants, activities etc. The staff even remembers  us when we get there to check in. (I LOVE THAT!) Very nice and comfortable!  We will be back!
Manager Response: Toni,  Thank you very much for taking the time for your response. We are proud to be a part of all of the tournaments around town and even more so that your family enjoys their time with us. Hopefully, we get to see you again soon and your next stay will be as good as the first.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Outstanding hotel.  Easy to access.  Well priced for the area.  Good staff, clean rooms.  Nice to have breakfast (cold and hot) each morning.  Definitely would stay there again.   We also used the fitness facilities and we were very pleased at the quality of machines offered which served every need during our workout routines.
Manager Response: Richard,  Thank you very much for taking the time for your review. We're pleased to hear our property as well as all of the amenities were up to your standards. We take great pride in offering a clean and comfortable hotel. Thank you again for your time.  Regards,  Scott

Summary: Had a great weekend getaway here at the Hilton Garden Inn. Nathan at the front desk was great. He answered all my questions. The room was nice with a adjustable bed. Amazing coffee maker too. My mom loved the hot tub. Especially after being at Disneyland all day. We also liked the evening cookies. Thanks Hilton for making my weekend stay great !!
Manager Response: Hi niv27, Thank you very much for your review, we appreciative you letting us know how you had a great weekend with us. We'll be sure to recognize Nathan  for a job well done and we are lighted that your mom loved the hot tub. We look forward to your return when you are in the area, and look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Summary: A value hotel that was clean and met our overall needs.  Many of the guests in our soccer party did not like the showers at all.  Walls are thin, so heard people walking above us throughout the evening.  Wasn't a problem as we just got used to it.  I wouldn't stay here again if we needed to be at the hotel for an extended time.
Manager Response: Hi geoffreypc, Thank you very much for your review,. we appreciative you letting us know how you were pleased with the cleanliness of our hotel  and met your overall needs during your stay. We apologize for the water and noise issue you experienced and made sure that it is addressed.  . We hope we can prove ourselves to you on your next stay and if you can please call me directly to make your reservation.

Summary: Check-in was rapid. Rooms are nice. Price is very good. If you are a light sleeper and find heavy feet an issue get a third floor room. Property is frame construction not block. Most guests around me were down by midnight but some were up at the crack of dawn. Area has industrial growth and area hotels cater to this. Nearby grocery and restaurant options were excellent.
Manager Response: Hi Mark S, Thank you for sharing your positive comments about our rapid check in and our location on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay. Very nice location.
Summary: We recently visited LA and stayed at the hotel for almost a week. Everyone there has a welcoming and helping attitude.   Check-in was easy, room and bathroom were clean. Hotel is located in a mostly professional area so it is quite. Air conditioning performs well so rooms are always at a nice cool temperature. Pool is outdoors and well maintained. Parking is free. Wifi is free is for three devices, if you have trouble connecting, just talk to the Manger on duty. The restaurant in the hotel has excellent food. We preferred to have breakfast there, kids enjoyed it.  The business center is equipment with two computers and printers and everything works. Hotel is located very close to Foothills ranch Town Center
Manager Response: Hi Travel 1234562013, Thank you very much for a great review. We appreciate you letting us know how welcoming and helping attitude our staff was and we are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us. Our staff strives to provide excellent service and looks like they did a great job, thank you for mentioning Scott, Nydia, Derek,Julio and Gladys.We will share your review with our hotel management  to make sure they are achnowledge for their outstanding service. We invite you to return to the hotel again in the future for another enjoyable stay.

We checked in with our children and they were unable to provide us with at room with two beds.  The hotel did not have any rollaways and were unable or unwilling to provide linen for our children to sleep on the floor.

We hope we can prove ourselves to you on your next stay and if you can please call me directly to make your reservation.

Once I asked them to return later as I was doing some conference calls on the phone before leaving to work. For my surprise, when I returned late at night, my room was never serviced!
Manager Response: Hi baldisrp,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We have taken your issue seriously and made sure that it is addressed. We  hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: When a hotel deserves a good review I have to provide what's due them.  However, I hate to do this because others will know of my secret and may cause the hotel to fill up!  The staff is always friendly, rooms are always clean and fresh, and the food is really, really good.  I love that I don't have to go out for a meal - their pasta is the best!
Manager Response: Hi James B, Thank you for taking the time to write  this great review ! We love to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, and I'll be sure to forward your comments to our staff. Again, thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon!

Manager Response: Hello Adreena, We apologized for the issue you experienced during your stay with us. We have taken your comment seriously and made sure it is addressed. We hope we can prove ourselves to you on your next stay and if you can call me directly to make your reservation.

Summary: The staff go out of their way to make it an easy, relaxing and enjoyable stay.  From the front desk and restaurant staff, and to the maid service...it's a welcoming experience.  The rooms are large and kept spotlessly clean.  I have spent a couple of weeks here in the last month...and will continue with another long stay in August.  A special mention of the helpfulness of Jasmine who explained the local dining options in the area, and to Lino for his prompt and efficient service in the bar/restaurant.
Manager Response: Hello B F,  Thank you for sharing your review with us, We agree that our front desk, restaurant and maid service made your stay enjoyable, relaxing and had a great welcoming experience. We invite you again for another long stay with us to enjoy another relaxing and welcoming experience.

One of the stars there is Wilson Hasiholan who makes everyone feel welcome and works hard to take care of his guests.  Other permanent staff who make this hotel work are Lino, Sandy, Hector, and Nathan.  Like other hotel chains, the facility and the features are pretty much the same but it is the people that make the difference.  Quality people with good sense for customer service make this HGI a special place.

We agree that Wilson Hasiholan are outgoing,friendly,helpful and makes everyone welcome and thank you for recognizing Lino, Sandy, Hector and Nathan being a great asset to our team and we will share your review with the hotel management to make sure they are acknowledge for making Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest a special place. We invite you to return to the hotel again in the future for another  friendly and enjoyable experience

Manager Response: Hi Ethan,  thank you for taking the time to write a review. We have taken your comment seriously and made sure it is addressed. I hope you got your revised folio. The cleaning products used and the fragrance used to clean the hotel rooms needs to change IMMEDIATELY. That is the only set back of this hotel. Because of this chemical smell, I would probably not stay here ever again. The hotel staff and help were incredible and attentive. Just that smell every time my room was cleaned and lingered during the duration of my stay was terrible. Please fix immediately. Thank you!
Manager Response: Hi Mindy, Thank you for your review. I have forwarded your comment to my Executive Housekeeper and our vendor. We will make sure it is addressed immedietly. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The room furnishings and AC were outdated but the staff was friendly and helpful. The hotel is located in a nice clean area but not much to do around there except for basic shopping not to include malls. If you like very quite it's a good area. O
Manager Response: Hi Veronica S. ! Thank you for your review our Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest here on TripAdvisor. Thank you for your kind comment about our amazing staff how they are frendly / helpful and the cleanliness of our hotel. We are working on our furnitures and A/C to be updated soon. We hope to welcome you back again.

Summary: The hotel was clean, within walking distance of shopping, restaurants and easy freeway access.  Breakfast was top notch and the hotel staff was more than accommodating.   We arrived earlier than planned and the front desk went out of their way to get a room available so we could check in.

Guests like you are the reason we love what we do at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/lake Forest!

Summary: needed a hotel close to a family function, this was it and the experience was great, good value!! Rooms were clean, up to date, internet was complimentary and was actually pretty good Check in, Sandi was excellent, a little situation with check in room but was handled quickly and to our satisfaction

Summary: Great hotel, great staff, and convenient/safe location in Orange County, CA.  I travel for business and stay at this hotel often and have never had any issues. Hotel is located about 1/2 way between LA and San Diego and about 20 minutes drive from Laguna Beach and Disney Land.

We are your home away from home.

Not a while lot else is out here so if you are looking to get away from the bustle of the denser parts of Orange County - this is the place.

Manager Response: Hi Jemma  C.! We appreciate you taking the time to write a review on our Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest. We are glad you found our hotel Uncomplicated, very clean and friendly staff. We are happy to provide what you needed for your 14 month old baby and  everything worked  as you expected. We hope to see your family back soon.

Summary: We had a great stay at the Hilton Garden Inn. The pool and excercise room were well equipped with all the machines I needed to complete my regular excercise regimine. The staff was all very friendly and helpful and very accomodating!  We had an amazing breakfast in the morning with an amazing server John.  He was very sweet and my kids loved him!  Staff at the front desk were great in meeting our every need.   Thanks for a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Hi Aimee B , I am thrilled you were very satisfied with your stay at our Hilton Garden Inn East/Lake Forest. Glad you enjoyed our pool and excercise room that was able to complete your regimen. We appreciate for recognizing John in our restaurant and our hotel staff  for being accommodating. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: My stay at the hotel was fine. The building itself is getting a little run down. I only stay here when other local hotels are not available. The staff are courteous and friendly. The location is a little inconvenient. The air conditioning is a little noisy but not terrible. To sum up, this hotel is not terrible at all. It's just not good either. :)
Manager Response: Hi Donal D, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We always appreciate constructive comment. We have taken your comment seriously and made sure that it is addressed. We are so happy that  felt  the service of our friendly and courteous staff.. We hope we can prove ourselves to you and welcome you back again.

Summary: I've stayed in many hotels around the country, and it's always pleasant to have a greeting like the one I received at HGI Lake Forest.  The room was in perfect condition, and they handled the needs of my special child with care and precision.  The room was always cleaned perfectly, and I was greeted in a kind manner both coming and going.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Irvine area!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments about your stay. We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and our staff. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Hotel is a great bargain, and well within driving distance to lots of shopping and businesses.  Stayed for business trip.  Hallways and carpets are a bit dated, but do not let that fool you.  The rooms are fine, and they have an abundance of pillows so that you can find at least one you like.  The hotel is clean, and the staff is very friendly.  They serve a wonderful breakfast, and have a well-stocked bar and dinner available in the restaurant, along with sports channels.  All-in-all it was a great week, and I will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your positive review, We appreciative you letting us know how you had a good experience in your business trip . Hope we can exceed your expectation next time you are in our hotel. I am looking forward to see you in your next business trip.

Summary: Spend two nights in this HGI this week. It is easy to find, close to the malls and restaurants and it has ample parking. Check in was quick but the dinner and breakfast service were very slow. Manager Response: Thank you, for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We love to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, and I'll be sure to forward your comments to our staff. Again, thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon!

Summary: Service here was very nice.  Front desk people were very friendly and helpfull.  The lobby was very clean as well as the overall place.  The rooms were very nice with very comfortable beds.  I felt very safe here with my family.  Stayed for a soccer tournament and there were plenty of places to eat close by.  Will recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us during your soccer tournament and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The hotel was clean, the staff was friendly and accommodating.  Loved the cookies!  Everything was comfortable and spacious.  The location is off a toll road, but you don't have to take the toll road to get to it.  I only wish they offered a free breakfast for the money, I thought the breakfast was a bit pricey and it's no different than the free ones at competing hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we do offer free breakfast to our Hhonor members who is Gold and Diamond members. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Stayed here just one night but wished it could've been longer! We arrived at noon, well before the check-in time, but were accommodated immediately. Manager on duty, Scott Hockett, went out of his way to check on room availability and with just a very short wait (about 10 minutes), we were settled in our room. The room was a king with a fridge and microwave.  Coffee pot, with real coffee cups, was a nice touch! Room had a warm, homey feel and smelled fresh and clean. Bed was the select comfort type and was very comfortable despite the fact that we couldn't figure out how to adjust it! Chair with ottoman for resting your feet and ergonomic desk chair added to our comfort. Room was spacious with plenty of drawer and closet space and was nicely decorated. Bathroom was very clean
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed your stay.   We'll be sure to recognize Scott Hockett for a job well done. We hope to welcome you again soon and hope you will stay longer than one day.

Summary: Good location for swim events at Mission Veijo & Irvine area.  Near restaurants and shopping, and short drive to ppols. In hotel food good too. Business center easy to access and met my need to travel without laptop or smart phone.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor! We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience on your swim event and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Recently stayed at this Hilton Garden and was pleased with the experience.  The room was nice and clean and a good size.  It had a refrigerator and functional desk space.  TV was a bit on the smaller size, but worked fine.  As a Hilton Gold member I had the free breakfast which was not bad.  They do cook to order eggs and have some other items out buffet style.  The hotel is in a good location and was very quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review,. we appreciative you letting us know how you were pleased with your stay  with us. We look forward to your return when you are in the area, and look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Summary: this hotel was recommended by the family whose wedding I was to attend because it was closer to the wedding site, I may not have chosen this hotel if I have known the confusion and tiresome wait that I was going to endure during the check in time, furthermore the room was not what I expected and it did not smell very clean, rugs felt like they were wet, uncomfortable for bare feet
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We appreciate your feedback, Please accept our sincere apology for your experienceof long wait and the condition of your room. We hope we can have another chance to show you what our warm Hilton Garden Inn is all about here at our hotel, if your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: Great last minute reservation and rate
Summary: We had not made reservations and did not expect to receive a discounted rate at the last minute.  Thank you to the friendly and professional front desk staff and general manager.  Quiet, clean and comfortable room.  Easy access to local dining and shopping.   We have family living nearby, which made this a great central location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay with us. I'm very glad to hear we were able to accommodate your needs with the amenities we have to offer, and of course our staff that was able to help. We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your travel needs and look forward to seeing you back in the near future!

Summary: quiet, hidden, close to new stores and restaurants. Bed and room ok, need new clean off channel changers. Hard to find hotel from road, better signage would help.  Good lobby area, bright and cheerful. Staff was helpful, but lady at reception too pushy. Could not understand her both on the phone and in person.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay with us. I'm very glad to hear that you liked our good  lobby -bright and cheerful, and of course our staff that was able to help but a bit pushy and can not understand which is already addressed. We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your travel needs and look forward to seeing you back in the near future!

Summary: We arrived from Arizona on the late side and very tired.  NATHAN at the front desk was understanding, quick and expediant and had us on our way to our room in no time.  He exceeded our expectations.  Next day at breakfast the staff was out in the dinning area ready and eager to take our orders.  Food was excellent as was the service.  We had a good nights sleep and was well rested for the continuation of our journey.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay with us. I'm very glad to hear we were able to exceed your expectation in tems of our superb service and the amenities of our hotel. Nathan is a great asset in the company and will make sure he will be commended for this service. We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your travel needs and look forward to seeing you back in the near future!

Summary: I am biased. We like Hilton Garden Inns. The in room refrigerator, microwave and laundry make life easier and the rooms are always neat as a pin. The rooms have more light than most long term stay hotels. It is the ideal compromise. The hotel costs a little more, but it is worth it and if you book in advance you can get a better rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay with us. I'm very glad to hear we were able to accommodate your needs with the amenities such as microwave and refrigerator  we have to offer, and of course our superb staff that was able to help. We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your travel needs and look forward to seeing you back in the near future!

Summary: This hotel is fairly nice and very clean. The rooms are small but comfortable enough. There is a small refrigerator and microwave in the room as well. The lobby has a nice seating area in front of a fire place and there is an area to get some food although it does not appear to be a full service restaurant. I didn't try to get food there so I'm not sure how much food is available. Overall great value if you need somewhere to stay for the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay with us. I'm very glad to hear we were able to accommodate your needs with the amenities we have to offer, and of course our staff that was able to help. We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your travel needs and look forward to seeing you back in the near future!

Summary: Very nice and clean property, very comfortable beds and good work space for the business traveler. Bathrooms are a little tight and the AC units a bit noisy. Staff is very nice, polite and professional.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay with us. I'm very glad to hear we were able to accommodate your needs for your business trip. I am glad that you like the working space and our comfortable beds  we have to offer, and of course our polite and professional staff that was able to help. We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your travel needs and look forward to seeing you back in the near future!

Summary: Great place to stay for a short trip to So Cal. Close to everything. Reasonably priced. We needed a place to stay for a mini vacation and visit family. We were impressed with the friendly staff and value of this property. Room was clean, we felt safe and did not have any issues at all. There is lots of places to eat and coffee shops close by. We will stay here again.

I'm very glad to hear we were able to accommodate your needs for your minin vacation, and of course our friendly staff that was able to help. We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your travel needs and look forward to seeing you back in the near future!

Summary: This hotel is next door to a Hilton Hampton Inn, the location of the hotel's entrance was a bit confusing. The staff was very friendly and the check-in was quick. My room was pleasantly cool on entrance. Ordered dinner from room service, prompt delivery and very tasty. Ate breakfast in the dining room, average food, very good staff. I would stay here again.

Summary Heading: Another Great Hilton Garden Inn Stay
Summary: Lovely hotel, helpful courteous staff, comfortable room and beds, very clean and updated. We received complimentary breakfasts for two mornings because our room was not quite available at check-in time due to the 4th of July weekend. Staff also went out of their to make us some coffee and hot chocolate for my grandson, along with pastries. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Foothill Ranch area!

I'm very glad to hear we were able to accommodate your needs with the amenities we have to offer, and of course our courteous  staff that was able to help. Summary: The Hilton Garden Inn is reasonably priced with truly excellent service and accommodations.  You can't lose if you stay here. My husband, son, and I recently stayed a couple of nights and couldn't have been happier.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay with us. We are happy to that were able to leave a good impression during your family visit. We look forward to having you back in the near future for your travel needs.

Summary: We stayed here for a softball tournament and our two queen bed room was very nice.  The pool was kind of small and overrun with other families but overall it is a good hotel and we would stay again.  The hotel staff was very friendly and my kids loved the cookies that were placed at the front desk.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay with us. We are happy to that were able to leave a good impression during your softball tournament and the cookies helped the kids. We look forward to having you back next year.

Summary: Stayed two days while attending a friend's nearby wedding reception. I found the suite clean, beds comfortable and staff friendly.  I have to compliment Sandy for ensuring our ground level room while my spouse and I drove from the Bay area to Southern California and we experienced a late arrival.  Andy and Nathan at the front desk were accommodating with providing us with toiletries that we had forgotten, breakfast coupons and water.  I would not hesitate on recommending or making a return stay at this excellent Hilton Garden Inn.

I'm very glad to hear we were able to accommodate your needs with the amenities we have to offer, and of course our staff that was able to help. Summary: I am a Hilton Diamond member and stay roughly 200 nights per year.  The Hilton Garden Inn brand is one of the stronger brands that Hilton chain has to offer.  This HGI branch in Lake Forest, CA is particularly excellent - the staff is exerts experience and is very helpful.  The breakfast staff is good, although during peak times (Saturday and Sunday brunch times) there is only one server found.    Overall, I definitely recommend this hotel for any business travelers in Southern CA.
