Summary: I think I should be given consideration on the rate during  off season and week ends at a business Hilton Hotel and Hilton Family Hotels.  I am a Diamond Club Hilton Honors member and I own a Los Vegas Hilton time share. I do not like the new corp. policy of depriving the Hotel manager the right to offer a lower rate to loyal clients.
Manager Response: We are delighted you chose  Hilton garden Inn Irvine East when you were in town and  being a Diamond Hilton Honnor member.  Thank you for your feedback . Best available rate is given to our valuable guest based on our occupancy. We strive not to be just basic Hilton Garden Inn but to be the BEST. We look forward having you back in the future.

Summary: Our second stay here. Very quiet and clean.  Great staff.  Walking distance to restaurants, stores and movie theater. They used to have free breakfast.  Now they charge. Full breakfast.  Kind of pricy but convenient
Manager Response: Welcome back !!! Thank you for your awsome feedback .We strive not to be just basic Hilton Garden Inn but to be the BEST. We look forward having you again in the future.

Summary: The staff is very courteous, attentive and professionally attired. The accommodations, especially the beds are great after long travels and long meetings.  A very restful experience is had every time I stay at  a Hilton Garden Inn.  My family enjoys the simplicity and comfort at each Inn.  After a few stays, my grand kids said they felt just like at home.
Manager Response: We are delighted you chose Hilton gargen Inn Irvine East when your family  were in town. Your grand kids is correct ..this is like home. Thank you for your feedback regarding our outstanding staff that made your stay comfortable. We strive not to be just basic Hilton Garden Inn but to be the BEST. We look forward having you back in the future.

Summary: the breakfast price was too high for adults, the free meal for children tasted great. the dinner quality was excellent. the bed was a little to hard. the pool and hot tube was clean and well kept. the staff were friendly and attentive to our needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we really appreciate you letting us know regarding the prcing of our restaurant. , how  our associates able to show you a superior customer service and how our facility is well kept clean. We look forward to your return.

Summary: This is an acceptable business hotel, amenities are good albeit quite basic, meals in hotels are definitely average, gym again is basic, small swimming pool, staff are very helpful and friendly. This is not a sight seeing area, I was given a $5 cab discount voucher when I booked a cab, the  driver didn't recognise it? If you are doing business in the immediate area great place, I had a meeting in Ontario just remember no public transport available buses trains etc. worth thinking about hire car. If touring, this hotel would be a fantastic overnighter.
Manager Response: We are delighted you chose our Hilton Garden Inn when you were in town for business. Thank you for your feedback .  We strive not to be just basic Hilton Garden Inn but to be the BEST. We look forward having you back in the future.

Summary: This hotel is clean and had the best customer service. We had the best breakfast in their restaurant . Internet is fast and their work out room is amazing. Pool is just right with the weather..it is very clean and they have the best bar ... looking forward for our next stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay with us. I'm very glad to hear we were able to accommodate your needs with the amenities we have to offer, and of course our staff giving the best customer service. We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your travel needs and look forward to seeing you back in the near future!

Summary: A small inn but with good furniture and room.  This inn provides breakfast for tenants.  This hotel come with self served laundry which is 8 quarters for washing and another 8 quarters for drying. The rate is at around $110/ night.  15 mins walk to nearby Regal 22 cinema which also have many types of cuisines there such as Italian, Vietnamese, Thai, Mexican and others.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review for you recent stay.  We are also less 1/4 of a mile from restaurants, theaters and jogging. As well, our parking lot is directly connected to mile of jogging,hiking and biking trails and only minutes from Irvine Spectrum shopping center.We look forward to having you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Decent business hotel with clean rooms and friendly service.
Summary: Very nice, friendly staff welcomed us. Rooms were big and very clean.   Only letdown was the pool looking on to the parking lot - not a very nice vista :)  Other than that it's a convenient business hotel for my needs and I will return.
Manager Response: We are delighted you chose Hilton gargen Inn Irvine East when you were in town for business. Thank you for your feedback regarding our outstanding staff that made your stay comfortable and clean rooms . We strive not to be just basic Hilton Garden Inn but to be the BEST. We look forward having you back in the future.

Summary: Nathan Ochoa at the front desk had incredible customer service and was able to adjust my room rate. Thank you Nathan your superior customer service is truly appreciated.  I Will be staying at the Hilton Garden inn for all my future California vacations.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we really appreciate you letting us know how Nathan our associates able to show you a superior customer service. we look forward to your return.

Summary: My son and I stayed at this hotel in March and the staff was outstanding.  They made sure we were taken care of and made sure we were comfortable.   Our room was quiet. clean and comfortable.  I had breakfast there and it was great.  We stayed there so could be close to our family as my Granddaughter was getting married.  It was convient and the staff made sure we had everything we needed. thanks to all of them.
Manager Response: We are delighted you chose Hilton gargen Inn Irvine East when you were in town for your grand daughter's wedding. Thank you for your feedback regarding our outstanding staff that made your stay comfortable and mentioned that breakfast was great. We strive not to be just basic Hilton Garden Inn but to be the BEST. We look forward having you back in the future.

Summary: this place started out good until we got to the pool area and saw the water. it was dirty and the spa was filthy. the only person doing her work in the area was the towel lady. lots of people in the pool area but not in the pool....... i wonder why?
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We always strive to have a  clean pool which we are proud , we even converted it to a Saline pool conversion for our part in our Green sustainability.  We have taken your comment seriouslyand made sure that it won't happen again. We look forward having you back in the future.

Summary: My daughter and I were booked to stay one night for a family wedding.  She got sick and was afraid she wouldn't be able to travel home on the day of check out.  We reserved the room for a second night and ended up checking out at 4pm because she felt well enough to travel.  There was no charge for a second night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review for your recent stay. We hope you daughter had a great time despite of her getting sick and enjoyed your family wedding. We look forward having you back in the future.

Summary: I have only positive things to say about this hotel! I booked 5 rooms for a small group to stay and this hotel was extremely accommodating. The front desk was amazing, the rooms are large, clean and comfortable, and the breakfast was excellent. I loved how the staff was very kind and helpful and didn’t make you feel as though you were inconveniencing them with your questions. I look forward to staying there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review for you recent stay. We are so happy to hear that our staff was able to leave a great impression! We look forward to having you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: One of the best by far because of one person!
Summary: This was my first time at the Hilton in Foothill, I was  greeted nicely and had the MOST helpful, curtious front desk clerk ever! I have stayed in many hotels and Nathan Ochoa made my stay a bit more warm. some places are stark and cold, but nathan was so helpful and went out of his way to make sure i was taken care of if i had a question like where to eat, shop etc. awesome young man!  the business center although small was very nice and had everything i needed to work away from home, and the facilities are clean and well kept. I dont work out but if i did i would be happy to use the area they have and bar was cute and i LOVED the flavored waters they have available daily!   Ty Nathan for making my stay so warm! even when i was away from home
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to let other potential guests know about your experience and recommending our hotel. I know it was your first time in our property and we are looking forward for more nights and to consider us your home away from home. Thank you for recognizing Natahan and  on behalf of everyone here at Hilton Garden Inn Foothill Ranch, thank you for being our guest,   We look forward to your return...

Summary: Had business meeting in the area - super close location and great service after a long day. Very friendly and helpful staff. Plenty of restaurants and shopping in the area. Great for group/organization stays. Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: We are delighted you chose our Hilton Garden Inn when you were in town for business. Thank you for your feedback . We are so happy to hear that our staff was able to leave a great impression! We look forward to having you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Hilton Stay at Foothill Ranch, CA
Summary: I am always happy to stay here at Hilton.  I was surprised that during my stay, I didn't get vouchers for free breakfast.  Upon checkout, I asked Nathan and he explained to me that when I did my reservation, I chose to get the points instead of the breakfast.  He was very pleasant and now I know why.  Staff is very friendly and I love it when they made a flower out of the face towels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feed back, we really appreciate you letting us know how your stay has been with us specially the folded towel that we do as a flower in our bathrooms. On behalf of everyone here at Hilton Garden Inn Foothill Ranch, thank you for being our guest, and we look forward to your return...

Summary Heading: Rest stop from San Diego Trip
Summary: I loved this quite and peaceful hotel.  It looked like there were mostly business people staying there.  I met 5 hotel employees and they were everything I would expect from an employee and better.  There was plenty of square footage in the room.  My daughter loved the pool.  There were plenty of places to eat just a few blocks away.  There was no traffic noise since it's not next to a busy street.  Free internet service but no free breakfast.  $12.95 for buffet breakfast and children 12 and under are free.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know how your daughter enjoyed our pool area. We are happy to hear that our staff exceed your expectation and we look forward seeing you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Very nice staff, good sized rooms
Summary: This HGI seems a little dated, but the rooms are a good size.  Front staff was great.  I remember walking in and there were a few people at the front desk.  I was waved by Nathan to check in.  It was nice that I didn't have to guess who to check in with.    Hotel is close to toll roads 133 and 241 if you are going to take them, and about a 10 minute drive to get to the 5.  Ample parking as this HGI has a shared lot with the Hampton Inn.  Breakfast was the typical HGI fare with a made to order hot breakfast, or their buffet.    I'd definitely stay here again when I am back in town.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and letting us know how nice our staff was. We are definetly looking forward to your return when you are in the area and to exceed your expectation on our  great service.

Summary: I was there for a quick business trip in Foothil Ranch.  The facilities were great.  Warm welcome upon arrival.  Cookies waiting for me at reception (nice when you're flying in very late and need something to tie you over until breakfast).  The room was roomy and the bed was very comfortable.  No concerns whatsoever.  Nice breakfast setup in the morning, however I didn't partake in it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feed back, we really appreciate you letting us know how your stay has been with us. On behalf of everyone here at Hilton Garden Inn Foothill Ranch, than you for being our guest, and we look forward to your return...

Summary: Stayed here for a school/business trip after having a not so nice stay late last year.  This time the staff and stay were awesome.  Management went out of their way to ensure we had a wonderful stay, from check in till check out they treated me like an A-lister.  The room was clean, and comfortable and the breakfast outstanding.  We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you came back and we were able to prove our selves. Thank you again for taking the time to review your stay. We look forward to seeing you again the future.

Summary Heading: Location farther east of 5 Fwy than I desired, Clean hotel, Staff very courteous, overall very good
Summary: Stayed for business retreat in Irvine. A bit farther east from the 5 fwy than I expected but hotel staff were very courteous, room was clean, bathroom was clean, bed was comfy. Hallway noise was a bit loud but nothing some inexpensive ear plugs couldn't fix. :)
Manager Response: We are delighted you chose our Hilton Garden Inn when you were in town for business. Thank you for your feedback, we really appreciate you letting us know. We are just beside Lake Forest exit from the 241 Fwy. We do apologize on the hallway noise. I am happy to read your comment on the cleanliness of the hotel and of course our friendly and attentive staff. We look forward to seeing you again in the future

Summary Heading: Great location, gym less than desirious
Summary: I had a wonderful stay at the HGI in Foothill Ranch. The greeted me when I walked in the door and resolved some billing issues without hesitation. However, with only 2 treadmills and one elipitical, I found the gym less than desirous.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your wonderful experience at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest. It is with great pride that we take care of our facility for the enjoyment of our guests. We will make sure to look into your concern about the number of our equipment in our exercise room. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: The employees are always cheerful and helpful. Our experience at this hotel made us feel right at home.
Summary: A group of us had three rooms for the night. The rooms were all clean and comfortable - they felt like we were lounging at home. The wifi is also pretty fast. The employees were willing to help and answer any questions we had. In the morning, we helped ourselves to the complimentary coffee and tea bar that they had available.  Overall, a great experience. Definitely going to this hotel again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are so happy to hear that our staff is very helpfull on all your needs. We appreciate the time to write such a positive review. We look forward to having you back in the near future.

Summary: I stayed at this property one night when attending a family function.  I am a regular Garden Inn guest, and a HHonors Diamond member.  The customer service was fine at check in/out.  The room was very clean, comfortable, and roomy.  For this, I would stay again.  However - AVOID THE RESTAURANT.  With the Diamond benefits, free breakfast is included.  The breakfast was "OK" but I would definitely not pay for this.  The fruit and other offerings were very basic and not very inspired.  The hot food the same, the service minimal at best.  I also had dinner there but wish I didn't.  The food was bad and the server was very inexperienced.  I had to ask for a refund as the restaurant didn't offer to make another dish or take care of it.  If I stayed at this location again, I would not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We always appreciate constructive comment. We have taken your comment seriously and made sure that we are in brand standard when it comes to our restaurant. We are happy that you enjoyed the rest of your stay at the Hilton Garden Inn- Irvine East/ Lake Forest and we would like to welcome you back in the future.

Summary Heading: No surprises.  Just good delivery of the Garden Inn experience
Summary: Nothing out of the ordinary.  if you've stayed at one Hilton Garden Inn.... The only differentiators is the staff and the location.  In this case the staff was great. Pros- Staff. Nice walking/running trail across the street.  Cons- You need a car to get anywhere (except the walking trail.)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review for you recent stay.  We are so happy to hear that our staff was able to leave a great impression!  We look forward to having you back in the near future!

Summary: This Garden Inn is located near the Foothill Ranch town center. It includes complimentary in-room coffee, coffee-maker, complimentary high-speed internet access with secure remote printing. in-room microwave and mini-refrigerator for only $124 on a Monday night. The room included a 32-inch flat-screen HDTV, a large work desk and an ergonomic Herman Miller desk chair.  As a Hilton Honors Gold member I also received either a full free breakfast or extra honor points. I selected the full freshly prepared Denver Omelet breakfast.  The small fitness center features free weights, Precor equipment, and flat-panel televisions. There is also an outdoor heated pool and whirlpool. This was a clean efficient good value. Of course free on site open parking lot was also included as usual.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us, and highlighting our amenities we have to offer.  We appreciate your loyalty as a Hilton Honors Gold member.  We strive to not be just another basic Hilton Garden Inn in the area.  Please let us know what we can do better to make your stays with us a 5 rating!

Summary: [1] When we checked in on Thursday 23rd Aug. 2012, I asked the front desk if the breakfast was complimentary and was told we would be charged by the item unless ordered from the kitchen which would be charged $12.99.  The next morning (Friday) my husband ordered from the kitchen while I had the items set out in the breakfast area. When I asked the waiter how much it would be and he told me it was free and only items ordered from the kitchen is charged @ $ 12.95.  I thought that was great but the next morning my husband and I both only ate only the items set out and the exact same waiter told me we would both be charged $8.99 each as "Continental breakfast".  There was no sign anywhere stating this and it is not stated in the book in the room either.  I then tried to verify this
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  We are sorry you experienced inconsistencies during your visit.  I assure you the issues that you brought up in your review are by no means the norm and have been addressed with the entire management team.  We would love to have the opportunity to regain your loyalty, so please feel free to contact me at joe.leinacker@hilton.com

Summary: From the Minute we walked in to the minute we walked out, we were treated as if we were in a 5 star resort. The restaurant and bar serves GREAT food at reasonable prices also.Sstaff all friendly.CLose proximity to Good restaurants and the staff gave great directions and were knowledgeable about area shops and things to do.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for highlighting all of the great things that our hotel has to offer! We are so happy to hear that you were treated to a 5 Star experience.  We appreciate you taking the time to write such a positive review and to mention our GREAT breakfast & dinner options as well as our friendly, welcoming staff.   All at a reasonable price. We look forward to having you back in the near future!

Summary: Stayed for 1 week due to a conference in Irvine.  Found the Hilton Garden Inn a gem.  The room was clean and comfortable, the front desk staff were friendly, and the on site restaurant staff were also very friendly.  I understand this is not the Ritz, however the service was still above what one would expect from what is typically considered a 3 star property.  There was an on site full service restaurant, and full bar, as well as room service.  But what made this stay comfortable was the ability to park (free), and walk to your room hassle free.  I would highly recommend this property for business and if you require little in the way of resort style accommodations, for family and vacation stays.  You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Your comments are incredible!  We thank you for taking the time to recommend our hotel to all travelers.  We know that when in this area there are a more then a lot of choices.  It sounds like we had everything you needed to make your stay with us comfortable and enjoyable.  We appreciate the comments on our friendly staff and amenities, and look forward to having you back next time you are in the Irvine area.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for any reason
Summary: My family and I recently stayed at this Hilton Garden Inn and the price was reasonable, and the room itself was comfortable. Additionally, there are quite a few complimentary snacks in the lobby so that was enjoyable for my family. The staff was immensely helpful and efficient, making sure that everything was up to par of our expectations. I would return again if ever needed! Ultimately the stay was really nice and well priced.
Manager Response: We appreciate you spreading the word about us being a great family hotel!  At times people think we are more of a corporate hotel, but we take pride in the fact that we are able to exceed your expectations while providing the best service and amenities in town.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I stayed here during June and I must say that everything about the hotel is excellent! The staff was very friendly when my family and I first came to check in. The pricing for the hotel room was also amazing for what you get out of your stay. For the 4 days we were here, the breakfast wasn't the best we've had, but it wasn't the worst. The hotel's staff made sure we were enjoying our stay and accommodated to our every need. I recommend this hotel to anyone who needs to stay in the area and I will DEFINITELY be coming back to stay again.
Manager Response: It was an honor having you as a guest of the Hilton Garden Inn Lake Forest / Irvine. Thank you for such a positive review of the hotel services and accommodations.  We are delighted that you will DEFINITELY be coming back to stay again.

Summary: This is a small quaint hotel hidden among the businesses in Foothill Ranch. It was further from the freeway than expected but once we arrived it was great. The lobby and restaurant carpet looks like it needs upgrading but with the excellent staff you hardly notice. The hotel was located next to a wide selection of shopping so you didn't have to travel far. All in all my family and I had a great stay here at the Garden Inn and will be back in the near future to have another great stay.
Manager Response: I love the words you used to describe our hotel, including your feelings once you finally arrived.  We thank you for providing such a wonderful review.  I am tremendously proud of the excellent service you and your family received from our staff.  As well as noting our local shopping and restaurants that Lake Forest has to offer.  We are excited to have you back for another great stay!

Summary: Found the room here to be worn and tired.  The carpet was filthy and in need of a good cleaning with large stains that were obvious and should have been attended to.  The front desk staff was not particularly helpful and stubborn instead of trying to accomodate a reasonable request.  It's one of the cheapest Hilton properties in the L.A. area and I guess you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: We would like to apologize for what sounds like an awful stay. I assure you we take great pride in our accomodations, in fact our cleanliness, customer service are two of the most complimented services from our guests. I have reviewed your comments with our entire management team and rest assured that no guest in the future will have the type of stay you had.

Summary: The price was excellent and the hotel was clean and updated. The bed was very comfortable. The breakfast was about $12.95 and didn't look wonderful but not bad either. I didn't purchase it so I really don't know. Parking was easy, hotel staff was very very nice and efficient. Water in the lobby at all times and cookies in the evening. Complimentary coffee and tea in the lobby in the morning. Overall great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review of our hotel.  I'm happy to hear to your comments on the cleanliness of the hotel, amenities, and of course our friendly and attentive staff.  Next time hope to turn the 4 star rating into a perfect 5!

Summary: To be fair, I probably caught them on a bad night.  it was late, we were tired and there was only one poor employee working the front desk.  We waited 10 minutes for her to get off the phone (one call she was on when we arrived, and two more while we stood waiting.)  The we she finally gets to us, she tells me there were no more queen bed rooms available, even though i reserved one.  And of course, all their rollaways were gone.  (They only have five in the entire hotel!)  The room was nice, clean and ample.  The two of us who slept in the king bed were comfortable, but we had to pile blankets on the floor for the third person.  We only stayed one night, and I was glad to pass on the overpriced ($12.95 plus tax) breakfast that would be free in most other places.  They charged
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear about your bad experience at check in.  I am sorry we were not able to accommodate your rollaway request.  We have taken your suggestion, and we will look to add more rollaway beds to meet demands during extremely busy times.  It is true we charge for breakfast and it is a vastly superior breakfast to the complimentary you find at most places, but we do offer a children eat free where children under 12 eat free with a paying adult (one child per paying adult).  We hope to have the opportunity to ensure your experience is better heading into the future. Please feel free to contact me if I am able to assist in any way.

Summary: It says in the lift if you aren't happy with your stay then you won't have to pay. They bend over backwards to make sure there is NOTHING you could possibly complain about! This is quite simply the best place we have stayed in for this price. I mentioned our coffee machine had an issue and it was replaced instantly. The beds have a setting to firm or soften the mattress to suit you, the desk chair is ergonomic, the drapes are beautiful, the toiletries are nice, the wifi is fast and free....the pool and hot tub are sparkling clean, the bar/restaurant are good value....and the staff are TOO nice! I would have liked to have had a kettle in the room as I prefer tea, but I'm sure if I had asked I would have had one before I had paused for breath. We happened to get chatting to a
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your positive experience at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest. Our staff takes great pride in providing a memorable experience for our guests in a clean, safe, and friendly environment. Our team will be happy to hear that you had an outstanding guest experience with us.    Thank you for being a loyal Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest guest.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in near future.  Sincerely,   Your team at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest

Summary: I come here on  on a weekly basis for business and the staff hs made this feel like my home away from home. They go out of their way to make sure I have everything I need. They even have ordered special items for the restaurant at my request. I wouldn't stay anywhere else! From the front desk to the restaurant staff to the housekeeping staff... This is the best service I have ever received!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write review about your recent stay at our hotel. We are so happy to hear that we have provided a consistent experience for you every time you return to our hotel.  We appreciate you taking the time to let other potential guests know about your experience and recommending our hotel. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,   Your favorite Home away from Home team at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest

Summary: Without a doubt, the staff and facility of this Hilton Garden Inn are the finest.  We absolutely get the best for our money.  The beds are wonderful, and the cleaning staff is flexible and able to meet any additional requests without hesitation.  We stay at this hotel exclusively because of the staff, the spacious rooms and their attention to detail.  The front desk always greets clients even though they may sometimes find themselves multi-tasking.  The cookies provided each night, the wonderful fruit-flavored water, and the outstanding grill make travelers so welcome.  From the management, that now includes Leslie, to the front desk where we see our wonderful Marie, no request is overlooked.  You are so fortunate to have this staff.  Coming from service-related industries, both
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  We are delighted to hear that we have provided a consistent experience for you every time you return to our hotel.  We are glad that our guests like to stay with us over and over again and that we can make you feel at home while you are in Foothill Ranch. On behalf of our entire team here at the Hilton Garden Inn Foothill Ranch we would like to thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit!   Sincerely,  Your team from the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest

Summary: Loved this property. It was easy to get to.  Clean, quiet, with an amazing breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your stay at our hotel.  We are glad you were satisfied with the cleanliness, quietness and quality of breakfast at our hotel. We take pride in our hotel as we strive to exceed all of our guests’ expectations.  On behalf of our entire staff here at the Hilton Garden Inn Foot Hill Ranch we would like to thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Liked it but won't be able to stay here again :(
Summary: I stayed at this specific hotel last year enough nights to earn Hilton Diamond status.  I liked it, the beds were comfy, the breakfast was adequate and the front desk staff were friendly- unfortunately I won't get to do that this year because they've priced themselves out of the market.  I travel weekly to this area and now the only place that is priced where I can stay is the Marriott Courtyard.  This hotel will be losing at least the other 3 consultants that work with me as we all have to switch allegiances because HGI seems to think they can be priced $60 higher than their direct competitor. The beds are nice- but they are not $60 bucks nicer....
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable input.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stays with us in the past and we hope we have the opportunity to serve you again.  Please give us a call to discuss your business needs to this area and perhaps we can work out better pricing options for you and your associates.    Congratulation on achieving Hilton HHonors Diamond status and we look forward to helping you earn fabulous Hilton HHonors rewards.

Summary Heading: Nice place for a business stay
Summary: I stayed three nights while on business in Irvine.  The hotel is standard for Hilton Garden, which is my preferred chain for business trips.  Since the hotel was busy, I was only able to book a double room.  I prefer a king bed and was pleasantly surprised that the desk clerk was able to find one for me.  It was an accessible room that was fine unless you need a bath tub.  My only complaint about the room was that the walk in shower didn't have a soap dish.  This doesn't make much sense as I'm pretty sure disabilities don't eliminate the need for bath soap.  I'm Hhonors gold so my breakfast was included.  The first morning, it was a little busy and somewhat disorganized.  After that, it was fine.  I think the normal breakfast hostess was off the first day because she seemed to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We hope to be able to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,  Your team from the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest

Summary: Spent 4 days at hotel to attend a family event.  Very helpful hotel staff, great housekeeping staff, and very attentive breakfast staff.  Hotel is very close by to gas stations, Target, WalMart, and many restaurants.  High speed internet worked great both wired and wirless.  Overall great stay and will be back.
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  We are glad you were satisfied with the amenities and cleanliness of our hotel.  We take pride in our hotel as we strive to exceed all of our guests’ expectations.  On behalf of our entire team here at the Hilton Garden Inn Foot Hill Ranch we would like to thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I have stayed here three times over the past year and found the hotel clean with big comfortable beds, the bathrooms are a little dated.  The hotel staff is genuinely friendly and helpful especially with restaurant recommendations.  The fresh baked cookies are a nice touch at the end of the work day.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your stay at our hotel.  We are delighted that our guests like to stay with us over and over again and that we can make you feel at home while you are in Foothill Ranch.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you on your next visit to the Foothill Ranch area.

Summary Heading: Wonderful! A great hotel from start to finish!
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel 3 times in the last year and it is wonderful! The staff is great and the hotel is gorgeous. Very clean and smoke free/pet free. Big beds and quiet rooms. Many places to eat nearby. A+++++++
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! Our guest's satisfaction is our #1 goal and it sounds as though we are succeeding.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you on your next visit to the Foothill Ranch area.

Summary Heading: OK but needs better fitness area
Summary: This is a typical HGI so no surprises. What stuns me is that it's in Orange County and has a horrible fitness facility. No weights and only two pieces of (dilapidated) cardio equipment. C'mon people, you're in the health and fitness capital of the world? The next time I stayed in the Hampton next door and it was just as good in every way, but a lot less expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write a review in regards to your recent stay with us.  We always appreciate constructive comments. We have taken your suggestion, and are in the process of remodeling our Fitness Center and should have it completely redone within 60 days.  We're happy that you enjoyed rest of your stay at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest, and hope to welcome you back again in the future!    Respectfully,  Your team from the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest

Summary: After two stays at this Hilton Garden Inn I can recommend it highly.  Do not go expecting a luxury property; it is a typical Hilton Garden Inn.  But the place is evidently well managed, clean and efficient.  The bed is not fitted with luxurious linens, but it is comfortable and the room is pleasant and not run down.  There is a little traffic noise from the nearby toll road, but it is not bothersome.  The bathroom is clean and there is plenty of evenly hot water.  The staff was cheerful and efficient.  There is ample free parking.  I didn't try the restaurant or other amenities.  This part of the Los Angeles area is strewn with tacky developments, so it is nice to be near the foothills and look out on them in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you, for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We love to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, and I'll be sure to forward your comments to our staff. Again, thank you for the recommendation, and we hope to be able to welcome you again soon!

Summary Heading: Typical HGI with a great front desk staff
Summary: How you are greeted by a great front desk staff it can set the tone for the rest of the stay.  The staff (and there were several I interacted with) was outsanding.  The property is a newish typical Hilton Garden Inn with all of the HGI amenities including a microwave and small fridge in the room.  The room was clean and in good shape and I found the king bed very comfortable.  The TV was a CRT type (boo) but had a wide range of cable channels (yay).  The internet speed was good even durning the evening when the hotel was full.    The food in the in-house restaurant was quite decent but the service could best be described as clumsy (unlike the front desk).  I appeared that the sole waiter/bartender was having to do other tasks as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than reading that you enjoyed your stay and were extended warm welcome. We'll be sure to recognize the staff for a job well done. We hope to welcome you again soon. Greetings, your team from the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine East/Lake Forest.

Summary: Stayed a weekend. Reviews on Trip Advisor were favorable. However this hotel did not live up to expectations.  Bathroom was very small and the vent fan did not work properly. Staff was told but nothing was done. In the morning they had a breakfast for guests in the lobby but wanted over $12. Way overpriced so we went to a Denny's close by. They had coffee but not even a donut or cookie. They wanted you to buy their breakfast. Swimming pool was very small and not very inviting. We did not use it. Location was good and area was quiet. The beds were nice and we did sleep well.  I might stay here again if I was by myself but I would not bring my wife here. Rooms/bathrooms were to small for two people to share. The Hampton Inn next door would be my preference in this area if I were
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor.  It's very helpful for us to know how well we did and to understand your perception of the overall experience.   You found  the bathroom in particular a bit small for two people to share and I can understand that.  We get used to having our own space at home and it's nice to have it when you travel as well.  I'm glad that you found the beds to be very comfortable and you had the quiet you needed for a good night sleep.  You are right that Hilton Garden Inns were designed to exceed the expectations of the business traveler.  When your travels bring you back to the area I hope you will consider staying with us again.  Feel free to call me personally and I'll hand-pick a great room for you!  Thank you for sharing your comments!  Sincerely,  General Manager Hilton Garden Inn

Summary Heading: Over all, a good stay.  Good night sleep
Summary: Pros-Room and bathroom were in very good condition.  The bathroom cleanliness was above average (no mold/mildew). The evening bar staff was great.  The morning breakfast staff was great. There is a nice walking/running trail right outside the hotel (Serrano Creek Trail).  Cons None that I can think of.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on Trip Advisor!  We are delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon! Sincerely, Diane Blake

Summary: The hotel property is well-kept and the room is comfortable.  The best part of the hotel is its friendly staff.  Everyone at the front desk and at breakfast had a great helpful attitude.  I received a late check-out with no problems and the breakfast staff recommended a delicious Belgian waffle that was quite tasty.
Manager Response: To a Fellow Buckeye, We're delighted that you chose our Hilton Garden Inn when you were in town for business recently.  I'll be sure to let our staff know how much you enjoyed your stay and and that you took the time to share your comments with Trip Advisor fans!  We hope to welcome you back the next time your travels' bring you back to sunny California!  Kindest Regards!

Summary: I was here from August 30- September 1, 2008. This was a good hotel. Best for crashing for the night. There is nothing much near the hotel and you have to drive everywhere. It was a good hotel and was a money-saver. There was nothing bad about it, but nothing amazing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I rather enjoyed my stay here at the Hilton Garden Inn in Foothill Ranch.  The room was clean and it had a mini refrigerator in it.  The decor was getting slightly dated so a renovation could be in it's future.  The staff was very nice and they had fresh baked cookies at the front desk each evening.  Unfortunately, like all Hilton Garden Inn's there is no free breakfast but there is a cooked to order one for around $12 a person.  I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A lovely modern hotel, which looks a little off the beaten track, but was really convenient for many locations. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff here, who were friendly and helpful at all times.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Upon first glance, this seemed like a new, clean hotel.  Tammy at the front desk was very helpful and apologetic when we arrived a bit early and found our room not cleaned/prepped.  She wanted to make sure that she gave us a room far away from the smoking side.  I appreciated that... however...   The bed was definately not up to Hilton standards.  My wife and I are specifically drawn to Hilton because of the high quality beds and this one was a tired mattress that didn't hold up to the quality we expect from Hilton.  The shower was clean, but the shower head (at least in our room) put out enough water to make you feel like you were standing in a heavy dew...or in the fog of San Francisco.  Not sure where the water pressure went... but it wasn't here.  Breakfast was... sort of
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stay! - Would stay here over neighboring Hampoton Inn
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for two nights to go to visit family. I was able to get a good price by booking using the ‘USA Swimming’ rate found under the promotions tab on the Hilton home page. The rate is good for everyone till 31Dec2008.  The hotel was clean and new looking. Also, I had stayed at the neighboring Hampton Inn before and was curious what the HGI was like. As a gold HHonors member I was given breakfast vouchers for everyone in the room. The room was very clean and comfortable. Also, as an elite member they had a bag of trail mix and bottled water waiting for me in the room.   As I had business to do while I was there, the business center came in handy. It is secluded from the lobby and has a full sized copy machine in it (shared by hotel staff). While I was there, I
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms are nice once you get in them but once you leave and return the keys don't work. We had two rooms and when ever someone from either room left the keys didn't work when they returned. The office staff yelled at the workers in front of customers. The first time when we went to the room it hadn't been cleaned. We traded rooms and went upstairs to our new room and the keys didn't work so we had to go back downstairs and get new ones. We feel it was very poorly managed and would not stay there again. It's to bad because the rooms were nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was an extremely pleasant hotel.  I'd imagine that most stays are for business, and it is great fo this purpose.  Nice rooms, good wireless in the rooms, a pool, a workout facility, a bar in the lobby and friendly helpful staff.  And it was really cheap by SoCal standards.    I tend to stay in reasonable nice hotels for business travel and this one exceeded my expectation.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn was a pleasant surprise.
Summary: I stayed here with my boyfriend for an event (GVR) we had to attend in Lake Forest. I looked at the list of hotels that were affiliated with the event and wasn't expecting anything spectacular. We usually stay at Starwood properties because we get points but there isn't anything in the immediate area. We needed something that was walking distance to this concert we were attending.   The room we got was on the 2nd floor. It was nice and clean. The hotel seems fairly new. I would probably stay here again and that's saying something for me. I like 4-5 stars only but we had no choice. The restaurant isn't anything to write home about so don't eat there. The toiletries are crap so I'd suggest bringing your own. The bed was pretty comfortable. Our friends stayed on the first floor and

Summary: Stayed for 5 days. Great value for the price. Quiet with extremely helpful, friendly staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was new and clean.  Must be a new hotel.  All of the staff was friendly and accommodating.  Very nice.  My only complaint, I could never get the GM to return my phone call.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here on a business trip. hotel seemed new.  Everything was nice and well maintained. No problems at all. Typical hilton garden inn. Would stay there again.
